 18632                                  ;
 18633                                  
 18634                                  ;**	DELETE.ASM - Low level routine for deleting files
 18635                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18636                                  ;		DOS_DELETE
 18637                                  ;		REN_DEL_Check
 18638                                  ;		FastOpen_Delete	       ; DOS 3.3
 18639                                  ;		FastOpen_Update	       ; DOS 3.3
 18640                                  
 18641                                  ;   Revision history:
 18642                                  ;
 18643                                  ;   A000  version 4.00	Jan. 1988
 18644                                  ;   A001  Fastopen Rename fix	April 1989
 18645                                  
 18646                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 18647                                  
 18648                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 18649                                  ;	i_need	Creating,BYTE
 18650                                  ;	i_need	DELALL,BYTE
 18651                                  ;	i_need	THISDPB,DWORD
 18652                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 18653                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 18654                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 18655                                  ;	i_need	ATTRIB,BYTE
 18656                                  ;	i_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 18657                                  ;	i_need	WFP_START,WORD
 18658                                  ;	i_need	REN_WFP,WORD			 ;BN001
 18659                                  ;	i_need	NAME1,BYTE			 ;BN001
 18660                                  ;	i_need	FoundDel,BYTE
 18661                                  ;	i_need	AUXSTACK,BYTE
 18662                                  ;	i_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 18663                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 18664                                  ;	i_need	FastOpenTable,BYTE		  ; DOS 3.3
 18665                                  ;	i_need	FastTable,BYTE			  ; DOS 4.00
 18666                                  ;
 18667                                  ;	i_need	Del_ExtCluster,WORD		  ; DOS 4.00
 18668                                  ;
 18669                                  ;	i_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ; DOS 4.00
 18670                                  ;	i_need	DMAADD,DWORD
 18671                                  ;	i_need	RENAMEDMA,BYTE
 18672                                  
 18673                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18674                                  ;
 18675                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DELETE
 18676                                  ;
 18677                                  ; Inputs:
 18678                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 18679                                  ;		terminated)
 18680                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 18681                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 18682                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 18683                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 18684                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 18685                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 18686                                  ; Function:
 18687                                  ;	Delete the specified file(s)
 18688                                  ; Outputs:
 18689                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 18690                                  ;		OK
 18691                                  ;	CARRY SET
 18692                                  ;	    AX is error code
 18693                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 18694                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 18695                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 18696                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 18697                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 18698                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 18699                                  ;		error_access_denied
 18700                                  ;			Attempt to delete device or directory
 18701                                  ;		***error_sharing_violation***
 18702                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 18703                                  ;			This error is NOT returned. The INT 24H is generated,
 18704                                  ;			  and the file is ignored (not deleted). Delete will
 18705                                  ;			  simply continue on looking for more files.
 18706                                  ;			  Carry will NOT be set in this case.
 18707                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 18708                                  ;
 18709                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18710                                  
 18711                                  FILEFOUND   equ 01h
 18712                                  FILEDELETED equ 10h
 18713                                  
 18714                                  	; 12/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 18715                                  	; DOSCODE:63E9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 18716                                  
 18717                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IBMDOS.COM)
 18718                                  	; DOSCODE:6B11h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 18719                                  
 18720                                  DOS_DELETE:
 18721                                  
 18722                                  ;hkn; DOS_Delete is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up 
 18723                                  ;hkn; appropriately at this point.
 18724                                  
 18725 00002B6B E8B9EC                  	call	TestNet
 18726 00002B6E 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_DELETE
 18727                                  
 18728                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 18729                                  ;	transfer NET_DELETE
 18730                                  ;ELSE
 18731                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) | 19
 18732                                  	;INT	2FH
 18733                                  	;return
 18734                                  
 18735 00002B70 B81311                  	mov	ax,1113h
 18736 00002B73 CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - DELETE REMOTE FILE
 18737                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> 
 18738                                  			;		fully-qualified filename in DOS CS
 18739                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory structure for drive with file
 18740                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 18741 00002B75 C3                      	retn
 18742                                  ;ENDIF
 18743                                  
 18744                                  LOCAL_DELETE:
 18745 00002B76 C606[6F05]00            	MOV	byte [FOUNDDEL],0	; No files found and no files deleted
 18746 00002B7B E86BED                  	call	ECritDisk
 18747                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E500h

 18749 00002B84 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 18750                                  SKPNUL:
 18751 00002B88 AC                      	LODSB
 18752 00002B89 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 18753 00002B8B 75FB                    	JNZ	short SKPNUL		; go to end
 18754 00002B8D 83EE04                  	SUB	SI,4			; Back over possible "*.*"
 18755 00002B90 813C2A2E                	CMP	WORD [SI],2E2Ah ; "*."
 18756 00002B94 7506                    	JNZ	short TEST_QUEST
 18757 00002B96 807C022A                	CMP	BYTE [SI+2],"*"
 18758 00002B9A 741F                    	JZ	short CHECK_ATTS
 18759                                  TEST_QUEST:
 18760 00002B9C 83EE09                  	SUB	SI,9		; Back over possible "????????.???"
 18761 00002B9F 87FE                    	XCHG	DI,SI
 18762                                  
 18763 00002BA1 16                      	push	ss
 18764                                  	;pop	ds ; ! Retro DOS v3.0 BUG !
 18765 00002BA2 07                      	pop	es ; 17/05/2019
 18766                                  
 18767 00002BA3 B83F3F                  	MOV	AX,"??" ; 3F3Fh
 18768 00002BA6 B90400                  	MOV	CX,4		; four sets of "??"
 18769 00002BA9 F3AF                    	REPE	SCASW
 18770 00002BAB 751C                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18771 00002BAD 87FE                    	XCHG	DI,SI
 18772 00002BAF AD                      	LODSW
 18773 00002BB0 3D2E3F                  	CMP	AX,3F2Eh ; ".?"
 18774 00002BB3 7514                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18775 00002BB5 AD                      	LODSW
 18776 00002BB6 3D3F3F                  	CMP	AX,"??"
 18777 00002BB9 750E                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18778                                  CHECK_ATTS:
 18779 00002BBB A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 18780                                  	;and	al,1Fh
 18781 00002BBE 241F                    	AND	AL,attr_hidden+attr_system+attr_directory+attr_volume_id+attr_read_only
 18782                                  					; Look only at hidden bits
 18783                                  	;cmp	al,1Fh
 18784 00002BC0 3C1F                    	CMP	AL,attr_hidden+attr_system+attr_directory+attr_volume_id+attr_read_only
 18785                                  					; All must be set
 18786 00002BC2 7505                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18787                                  
 18788                                  ; NOTE WARNING DANGER-----
 18789                                  ;    This DELALL stuff is not safe. It allows directories to be deleted.
 18790                                  ;	It should ONLY be used by FORMAT in the ROOT directory.
 18791                                  
 18792 00002BC4 C606[7F05]00            	MOV	byte [DELALL],0		; DEL *.* - flag deleting all
 18793                                  NOT_ALL:
 18794 00002BC9 C606[4C03]01            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],1
 18795 00002BCE E8681E                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 18796 00002BD1 7312                    	JNC	short Del_found
 18797 00002BD3 750B                    	JNZ	short _bad_path
 18798 00002BD5 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 18799 00002BD7 7407                    	JZ	short _bad_path
 18800                                  No_file:
 18801 00002BD9 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found
 18802                                  ErrorReturn:
 18803 00002BDC F9                      	STC
 18804                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 18805                                  	;retn
 18806                                  	; 18/12/2022
 18807 00002BDD E936ED                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 18808                                  
 18809                                  _bad_path:
 18810 00002BE0 B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found
 18811 00002BE3 EBF7                    	JMP	short ErrorReturn
 18812                                  
 18813                                  Del_found:
 18814 00002BE5 750C                    	JNZ	short NOT_DIR		; Check for dir specified
 18815 00002BE7 803E[7F05]00            	CMP	byte [DELALL],0		; DelAll = 0 allows delete of dir.
 18816 00002BEC 7405                    	JZ	short NOT_DIR
 18817                                  Del_access_err:
 18818 00002BEE B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 18819 00002BF1 EBE9                    	JMP	short ErrorReturn
 18820                                  
 18821                                  NOT_DIR:
 18822 00002BF3 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; Check if device name
 18823 00002BF5 78F7                    	JS	short Del_access_err	; Can't delete I/O devices
 18824                                  
 18825                                  ; Main delete loop. CURBUF+2:BX points to a matching directory entry.
 18826                                  
 18827                                  DELFILE:
 18828 00002BF7 800E[6F05]01            	OR	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEFOUND ; file found, not deleted yet
 18829                                  
 18830                                  ; If we are deleting the Volume ID, then we set VOLUME_CHNG flag to make
 18831                                  ; DOS issue a build BPB call the next time this drive is accessed.
 18832                                  
 18833 00002BFC 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 18834 00002BFD 8A26[7F05]              	MOV	AH,[DELALL]
 18835 00002C01 C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]
 18836                                  	
 18837                                  ;hkn; SS override
 18838 00002C05 36F606[6B05]01          	TEST	byte [SS:ATTRIB],attr_read_only ; are we deleting RO files too?
 18839 00002C0B 7509                    	JNZ	short DoDelete		; yes
 18840                                  
 18841 00002C0D F6470B01                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_read_only
 18842 00002C11 7403                    	JZ	short DoDelete		; not read only
 18843                                  
 18844                                  	; 30/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18845                                  Skip_it:
 18846 00002C13 1F                      	POP	DS
 18847 00002C14 EB57                    	JMP	SHORT DELNXT		; Skip it (Note ES:BP not set)
 18848                                  
 18849                                  DoDelete:
 18850 00002C16 E8AF00                  	call	REN_DEL_Check		; Sets ES:BP = [THISDPB]
 18851                                  	;JNC	short DEL_SHARE_OK
 18852                                  	;POP	DS
 18853                                  	;JMP	SHORT DELNXT		; Skip it
 18854                                  	; 30/01/2024
 18855 00002C19 72F8                    	jc	short Skip_it
 18856                                  
 18857                                  DEL_SHARE_OK:
 18858                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18859                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18860                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 18861 00002C1B F6450540                	TEST	byte [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 18862                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 18863 00002C1F 7507                    	JNZ	short yesdirty		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 18864 00002C21 E8053B                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 18865                                  	;or	byte [di+5],40h
 18866 00002C24 804D0540                	OR	byte [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 18867                                  yesdirty:
 18868 00002C28 8827                    	mov	[bx],ah 
 18869                                  	;MOV	[BX+dir_entry.dir_name],AH ; Put in E5H or 0
 18870                                  	;;;
 18871                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18872                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18873 00002C2A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 18874                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],bx
 18875 00002C2C 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0
 18876 00002C30 7503                    	jnz     short yesdirty_fc_1	;  not FAT32
 18877 00002C32 8B5CFA                  	mov     bx,[si-6]		;  high word of the first cluster (FAT32)
 18878                                  yesdirty_fc_1:
 18879                                  	;mov	[ss:CLUSTNUM_HW],bx 
 18880 00002C35 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx ; * ; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18881                                  	;;;
 18882                                  
 18883 00002C37 8B1C                    	MOV	BX,[SI] 		; Get firclus pointer
 18884 00002C39 1F                      	POP	DS
 18885                                  	;;;
 18886 00002C3A 8916[EF0A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx ; * ; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18887                                  	;;;
 18888 00002C3E 800E[6F05]10            	OR	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEDELETED ; 10h ; Deleted file
 18889                                  
 18890                                  	; 30/01/2024
 18891                                  	;CMP	BX,2
 18892                                  	;JB	short DELNXT		; File has invalid FIRCLUS (too small)
 18893                                  	;;;
 18894                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18895                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18896                                  	;cmp	word [CLUSTNUM_HW],0
 18897 00002C43 21D2                    	and	dx,dx ; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18898 00002C45 7505                    	jnz	short yesdirty_fc_2
 18899 00002C47 83FB02                  	cmp	bx,2
 18900 00002C4A 7221                    	jb	short DELNXT		; File has invalid FIRCLUS (too small)
 18901                                  yesdirty_fc_2:
 18902                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 18903 00002C4C 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0
 18904 00002C51 750C                    	jnz     short yesdirty_fc_3	; not FAT32
 18905                                  	;push	bx
 18906                                  	;mov	bx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 18907                                  	;;cmp	bx,[es:bp+2Fh]
 18908                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 18909                                  	;30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18910                                  	;mov	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 18911                                  	; dx = [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; *
 18912 00002C53 263B562F                	cmp	dx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 18913                                  	;pop	bx
 18914 00002C57 750A                    	jne	short yesdirty_fc_4
 18915                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+2Dh]
 18916 00002C59 263B5E2D                	cmp	bx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 18917 00002C5D EB04                    	jmp     short yesdirty_fc_4
 18918                                  yesdirty_fc_3:
 18919                                  	;;;
 18920                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 18921 00002C5F 263B5E0D                	CMP	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 18922                                  yesdirty_fc_4:	; 30/01/2024
 18923 00002C63 7708                    	JA	short DELNXT		; File has invalid FIRCLUS (too big)
 18924                                  
 18925 00002C65 E8F52D                  	call	RELEASE 		; Free file data
 18926 00002C68 7258                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 18927                                  
 18928                                  ; DOS 3.3  FastOpen
 18929                                  
 18930 00002C6A E8D900                  	CALL	FastOpen_Delete 	; delete the dir info in fastopen
 18931                                  
 18932                                  ; DOS 3.3  FastOpen
 18933                                  
 18934                                  DELNXT:
 18935 00002C6D C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Possible to get here without this set
 18936 00002C71 E8EB1B                  	call	GETENTRY		; Registers need to be reset
 18937 00002C74 724C                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 18938 00002C76 E8241B                  	call	NEXTENT
 18939                                  	;JNC	short DELFILE
 18940                                  	; 30/01/2024
 18941 00002C79 7203                    	jc	short DELNXT2
 18942 00002C7B E979FF                  	jmp	DELFILE
 18943                                  DELNXT2:
 18944 00002C7E C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; NEXTENT sets ES=DOSGROUP
 18945                                  	
 18946                                  	;;;
 18947                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18948                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18949                                  	;
 18950 00002C82 E8EE07                  	call	update_fat32_fsinfo
 18951                                  	;;;
 18952                                  
 18953                                  	; 12/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 18954                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 18955                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 18956                                  	; 15/12/2022
 18957 00002C85 268A4600                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP]
 18958 00002C89 E88C39                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 18959 00002C8C 7234                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 18960                                  ;
 18961                                  ; Now we need to test FoundDel for our flags. The cases to consider are:
 18962                                  ;
 18963                                  ;   not found not deleted		file not found
 18964                                  ;   not found	  deleted		*** impossible ***
 18965                                  ;	found not deleted		access denied (read-only)
 18966                                  ;	found	  deleted		no error
 18967                                  ;
 18968 00002C8E F606[6F05]10            	TEST	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEDELETED ; did we delete a file?
 18969 00002C93 7426                    	JZ	short DelError		; no, figure out what's wrong.
 18970                                  
 18971                                  ; We set VOLCHNG_FLAG to indicate that we have changed the volume label
 18972                                  ; and to force the DOS to issue a media check.
 18973                                  
 18974 00002C95 F606[6B05]08            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id ; 8
 18975 00002C9A 741C                    	jz	short No_Set_Flag
 18976 00002C9C 50                      	PUSH	AX
 18977 00002C9D 06                      	PUSH	ES
 18978 00002C9E 57                      	PUSH	DI
 18979 00002C9F C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 18980 00002CA3 268A25                  	MOV	AH,[ES:DI]		; Get drive
 18981 00002CA6 80EC41                  	SUB	AH,'A'                  ; Convert to 0-based
 18982 00002CA9 8826[A10A]              	mov	[VOLCHNG_FLAG],AH
 18983                                  	
 18984                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18985 00002CAD 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH			;>32mb delete volume id from boot record ;AN000;
 18986 00002CAF E8EB04                  	call	Set_Media_ID		;>32mb set volume id to boot record	 ;AN000;
 18987                                  	 
 18988 00002CB2 E8BD35                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; force media check
 18989 00002CB5 5F                      	POP	DI
 18990 00002CB6 07                      	POP	ES
 18991 00002CB7 58                      	POP	AX
 18992                                  No_Set_Flag:
 18993                                  	;call	LCritDisk		; carry is clear
 18994                                  	;retn
 18995                                  	; 18/12/2022
 18996 00002CB8 E95BEC                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 18997                                  DelError:
 18998 00002CBB F606[6F05]01            	TEST	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEFOUND ; not deleted. Did we find file?
 18999 00002CC0 7503                    	JNZ	short Del_access_errJ 	; yes. Access denied
 19000                                  No_fileJ:
 19001 00002CC2 E914FF                  	JMP	No_file ; 10/08/2018 		; Nope
 19002                                  Del_access_errJ:
 19003 00002CC5 E926FF                  	JMP	Del_access_err ; 10/08/2018
 19004                                  
 19005                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19006                                  
 19007                                  ;Break	<REN_DEL_Check - check for access for rename and delete>
 19008                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19009                                  ; Procedure Name : REN_DEL_Check
 19010                                  ;
 19011                                  ; Inputs:
 19012                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 19013                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX points to entry
 19014                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI points to firclus field of entry
 19015                                  ;	[WFP_Start] points to name
 19016                                  ; Function:
 19017                                  ;	Check for Exclusive access on given file.
 19018                                  ;	  Used by RENAME, SET_FILE_INFO, and DELETE.
 19019                                  ; Outputs:
 19020                                  ;	ES:BP = [THISDPB]
 19021                                  ;	NOTE: The WFP string pointed to by [WFP_Start] Will be Modified. The
 19022                                  ;		last element will be loaded from the directory entry. This is
 19023                                  ;		so the name given to the sharer doesn't have any meta chars in
 19024                                  ;		it.
 19025                                  ;	Carry set if sharing violation, INT 24H generated
 19026                                  ;	    NOTE THAT AX IS NOT error_sharing_violation.
 19027                                  ;		This is because input AX is preserved.
 19028                                  ;		Caller must set the error if needed.
 19029                                  ;	Carry clear
 19030                                  ;		OK
 19031                                  ; AX,DS,BX,SI,DI preserved
 19032                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19033                                  
 19034                                  	; 31/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19035                                  	
 19036                                  REN_DEL_Check:
 19037                                  
 19038 00002CC8 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 19039 00002CC9 57                      	PUSH	DI
 19040 00002CCA 50                      	PUSH	AX
 19041 00002CCB 53                      	PUSH	BX
 19042 00002CCC 56                      	PUSH	SI		; Save CURBUF pointers
 19043                                  	
 19044 00002CCD 16                      	push	ss
 19045 00002CCE 07                      	pop	es
 19046                                  
 19047                                  ;hkn; context ES will assume ES to DOSDATA
 19048                                  ;hkn; ASSUME	ES:DOSGROUP
 19049                                  
 19050                                  ;hkn; SS override
 19051 00002CCF 368B3E[B205]            	MOV	DI,[SS:WFP_START] ; ES:DI -> WFP
 19052 00002CD4 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19053                                  
 19054                                  ;hkn; SS override
 19055 00002CD6 368E1E[E405]            	MOV	DS,[SS:CURBUF+2] ; DS:SI -> entry (FCB style name)

 19263                                  ;============================================================================
 19264                                  ; RENAME.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 19265                                  ;============================================================================
 19266                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19267                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19268                                  
 19269                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_RENAME - Internal RENAME call for MS-DOS
 19270                                  ;	NAME	DOS_RENAME
 19271                                  
 19272                                  ;**	Low level routine for renaming files
 19273                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19274                                  ;	DOS_RENAME
 19275                                  ;
 19276                                  ;	Modification history:
 19277                                  ;
 19278                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19279                                  
 19280                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19281                                  ;
 19282                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_RENAME
 19283                                  ;
 19284                                  ; Inputs:
 19285                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to SOURCE WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19286                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19287                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string [SOURCE]
 19288                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19289                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19290                                  ;	[REN_WFP] Points to DEST WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19291                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19292                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19293                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19294                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19295                                  ; Function:
 19296                                  ;	Rename the specified file(s)
 19297                                  ;	NOTE: This routine uses most of AUXSTACK as a temp buffer.
 19298                                  ; Outputs:
 19299                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19300                                  ;	    OK
 19301                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19302                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19303                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19304                                  ;			No match for source, or dest path invalid
 19305                                  ;		error_not_same_device
 19306                                  ;			Source and dest are on different devices
 19307                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19308                                  ;			Directory specified (not simple rename),
 19309                                  ;			Device name given, Destination exists.
 19310                                  ;			NOTE: In third case some renames may have
 19311                                  ;			 been done if metas.
 19312                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19313                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19314                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19315                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19316                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19317                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19318                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19319                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 19320                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19321                                  ;
 19322                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19323                                  
 19324                                  	; 14/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19325                                  	; 31/01/2024 Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19326                                  
 19327                                  DOS_RENAME:
 19328                                  
 19329                                  ;hkn; DOS_RENAME is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up
 19330                                  ;hkn; at this point to DOSDATA.
 19331                                  
 19332 00002D7E E8A6EA                  	call	TestNet
 19333 00002D81 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_RENAME
 19334                                  
 19335                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19336                                  ;	transfer NET_RENAME
 19337                                  ;ELSE
 19338                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 17
 19339                                  	;INT	2FH
 19340                                  	;return
 19341                                  
 19342 00002D83 B81111                  	mov     ax, 1111h
 19343 00002D86 CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - RENAME REMOTE FILE
 19344                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, 
 19345                                  			; SDA first filename pointer = offset of fully-qualified old name
 19346                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19347                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19348 00002D88 C3                      	retn
 19349                                  ;ENDIF
 19350                                  
 19351                                  LOCAL_RENAME:
 19352 00002D89 C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk ; 2
 19353 00002D8E 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 19354 00002D92 8B3E[B405]              	MOV	DI,[REN_WFP]
 19355 00002D96 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 19356 00002D98 8A25                    	MOV	AH,[DI]
 19357 00002D9A 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020H		; Lower case
 19358 00002D9D 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH
 19359 00002D9F 7405                    	JZ	short SAMEDRV
 19360 00002DA1 B81100                  	MOV	AX,error_not_same_device ; 11h
 19361 00002DA4 F9                      	STC
 19362 00002DA5 C3                      	retn
 19363                                  
 19364                                  SAMEDRV:
 19365 00002DA6 FF36[2E03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19366 00002DAA FF36[2C03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD]
 19367 00002DAE 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	[DMAADD+2],DS
 19368                                  
 19369                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA is in DOSDATA
 19370 00002DB2 C706[2C03][2006]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],RENAMEDMA
 19371 00002DB8 C606[7005]00            	MOV	byte [FOUND_DEV],0	; Rename fails on DEVS, assume not a dev
 19372 00002DBD E829EB                  	call	ECritDisk
 19373 00002DC0 E86807                  	call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST	; Sets [NoSetDir] to 1, [CURBUF+2]:BX
 19374                                  					;    points to entry
 19375 00002DC3 7314                    	JNC	short Check_Dev
 19376 00002DC5 83F812                  	CMP	AX,error_no_more_files ; 12h
 19377 00002DC8 7503                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19378 00002DCA B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found ; 2
 19379                                  GOTERR:
 19380 00002DCD F9                      	STC
 19381                                  RENAME_POP:
 19382 00002DCE 8F06[2C03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD]
 19383 00002DD2 8F06[2E03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19384                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19385                                  	;retn
 19386                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19387 00002DD6 E93DEB                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19388                                  
 19389                                  Check_Dev:
 19390                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19391                                  	;mov	ax,5
 19392 00002DD9 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; Assume error
 19393                                  	
 19394                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19395 00002DDC 1E                      	PUSH	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19396 00002DDD C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		      ;PTM.  check if source a dir  ;AN000;
 19397                                  	;add	si,21
 19398 00002DE1 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19399                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 19400 00002DE4 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;PTM.	    ;AN000;
 19401 00002DE8 7407                    	JZ	short notdir		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19402 00002DEA 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		      ;PTM.  if yes, make sure path ;AN000;
 19403 00002DEE E86FFA                  	call	Check_PathLen2		      ;PTM.   length < 67	    ;AN000;
 19404                                  notdir:
 19405 00002DF1 1F                      	POP	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19406 00002DF2 77D9                    	JA	short GOTERR		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19407                                  
 19408                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19409 00002DF4 803E[7005]00            	CMP	byte [FOUND_DEV],0
 19410 00002DF9 75D2                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19411                                  
 19412                                  ; At this point a source has been found. There is search continuation info (a
 19413                                  ; la DOS_SEARCH_NEXT) for the source at RENAMEDMA, together with the first
 19414                                  ; directory entry found.
 19415                                  ; [THISCDS], [THISDPB], and [THISDRV] are set and will remain correct
 19416                                  ; throughout the RENAME since it is known at this point that the source and
 19417                                  ; destination are both on the same device.
 19418                                  ; [SATTRIB] is also set.
 19419                                  
 19420 00002DFB 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19421                                  	;add	si,26
 19422 00002DFD 83C61A                  	ADD	SI,dir_entry.dir_first
 19423 00002E00 E8C5FE                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 19424 00002E03 7305                    	JNC	short REN_OK1
 19425 00002E05 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 19426 00002E08 EBC4                    	JMP	short RENAME_POP
 19427                                  
 19428                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19429                                  ; Check if the source is a file or directory. If file, delete the entry
 19430                                  ; from the Fastopen cache. If directory, rename it later
 19431                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19432                                  
 19433                                  REN_OK1:				;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
 19434                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19435                                  	; 31/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19436                                  	;PUSH	SI
 19437 00002E0A C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		;BN00X; PTM. check if source a dir ;AN000;
 19438                                  	;add	si,21
 19439 00002E0E 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	;;BN00XPTM.P5520		;AN000;
 19440                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 19441 00002E11 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;;BN00XPTM. ;AN000;
 19442                                  	;JZ	short NOT_DIR1		;;BN00XPTM.			;AN000;
 19443 00002E15 7503                    	jnz	short SWAP_SOURCE ; 31/01/2024
 19444                                  	;POP	SI			;BN00X
 19445                                  	;JMP	SHORT SWAP_SOURCE	;BN00X
 19446                                  ;NOT_DIR1:				;;BN00X it is a file, delete the entry
 19447                                  	;POP	SI
 19448                                  
 19449                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19450 00002E17 E82CFF                  	call	FastOpen_Delete 	; delete dir info in fastopen DOS 3.3
 19451                                  SWAP_SOURCE:
 19452                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 19453                                  	;MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]
 19454                                  	;MOV	[WFP_START],SI
 19455                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19456 00002E1A A1[B205]                	MOV	AX,[WFP_START]		; Swap source and destination
 19457 00002E1D 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		; Swap source and destination
 19458 00002E21 8936[B205]              	MOV	[WFP_START],SI		; WFP_START = Destination path
 19459 00002E25 A3[B405]                	MOV	[REN_WFP],AX		; REN_WFP   = Source path
 19460                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19461 00002E28 C706[B605]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1	; No current dir on dest
 19462                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 19463 00002E2E C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0FFh  ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 19464                                  					; A rename is like a CREATE_NEW as far
 19465                                  					; as the destination is concerned.
 19466 00002E34 E8021C                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 19467                                  
 19468                                  ;   If this GETPATH fails due to file not found, we know all renames will work
 19469                                  ;   since no files match the destination name. If it fails for any other
 19470                                  ;   reason, the rename fails on a path not found, or whatever (also fails if
 19471                                  ;   we find a device or directory). If the GETPATH succeeds, we aren't sure
 19472                                  ;   if the rename should fail because we haven't built an explicit name by
 19473                                  ;   substituting for the meta chars in it. In this case the destination file
 19474                                  ;   spec with metas is in [NAME1] and the explicit source name is at RENAMEDMA
 19475                                  ;   in the directory entry part.
 19476                                  	
 19477 00002E37 722A                    	JC	short NODEST
 19478                                  	
 19479                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19480                                  	;JZ	short BAD_ACC 		; Dest string is a directory	;AC000;
 19481                                  	; !! MSDOS 3.3 !!
 19482                                  	;JZ	short BAD_ACC ; !!	; Dest string is a directory
 19483                                  
 19484 00002E39 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; Device?
 19485 00002E3B 7933                    	JNS	short SAVEDEST		; No, continue
 19486                                  BAD_ACC:
 19487 00002E3D B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 19488 00002E40 F9                      	STC
 19489                                  RENAME_CLEAN:
 19490 00002E41 9C                      	PUSHF				; Save carry state
 19491 00002E42 50                      	PUSH	AX			; and error code (if carry set)
 19492                                  	;;;
 19493                                  	; 31/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19494                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19495 00002E43 C42E[8A05]              	les	bp,[THISDPB]
 19496 00002E47 E82906                  	call	update_fat32_fsinfo
 19497                                  	;;;
 19498 00002E4A A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]
 19499 00002E4D E8C837                  	call	FLUSHBUF

 19861                                  ;
 19862                                  ;Input: DS:SI -> raw string with ?
 19863                                  ;	ES:DI -> destination string

 19865                                  ;Function: replace ? chars of raw string with chars in source string and

 19871                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19872                                  NEWNAM:
 19873                                  	; DOSCODE:680Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 19874 00002FBE AC                      	LODSB
 19875 00002FBF 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?" ; 3Fh

 19878                                  NOCHG:

 19886                                  ;============================================================================
 19887                                  ; FINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 19888                                  ;============================================================================
 19889                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19890                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19891                                  
 19892                                  ;**	Low level routines for returning file information and setting file
 19893                                  ;	attributes
 19894                                  ;
 19895                                  ;	GET_FILE_INFO
 19896                                  ;	SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19897                                  ;
 19898                                  ;	Modification history:
 19899                                  ;
 19900                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19901                                  ;
 19902                                  ;	M025: Return access_denied if attempting to set
 19903                                  ;	      attribute of root directory.
 19904                                  ;
 19905                                  
 19906                                  ;SUBTTL GET_FILE_INFO -- Get File Information
 19907                                  
 19908                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19909                                  ; Procedure Name : GET_FILE_INFO
 19910                                  ;
 19911                                  ; Inputs:
 19912                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19913                                  ;		terminated)
 19914                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19915                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19916                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19917                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19918                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19919                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19920                                  ; Function:
 19921                                  ;	Get Information about a file
 19922                                  ; Returns:
 19923                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19924                                  ;	    AX = Attribute of file
 19925                                  ;	    CX = Time stamp of file
 19926                                  ;	    DX = Date stamp of file
 19927                                  ;	    BX:DI = Size of file (32 bit)
 19928                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19929                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19930                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19931                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19932                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19933                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19934                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19935                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19936                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19937                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19938                                  
 19939                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19940                                  
 19941                                  GET_FILE_INFO:
 19942                                  
 19943                                  ;hkn; get_file_info is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set 
 19944                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19945                                  
 19946 00002FCA E85AE8                  	call	TestNet
 19947 00002FCD 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_INFO
 19948                                  
 19949                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19950                                  ;	transfer NET_GET_FILE_INFO
 19951                                  ;ELSE
 19952                                  ;	MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 15
 19953                                  ;	INT	2FH
 19954                                  ;	return
 19955                                  
 19956 00002FCF B80F11                  	mov     ax, 110Fh
 19957 00002FD2 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET REMOTE FILE'S ATTRIBUTES
 19958                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 19959                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19960                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = file attributes
 19961 00002FD4 C3                      	retn
 19962                                  ;ENDIF
 19963                                  
 19964                                  LOCAL_INFO:
 19965 00002FD5 E811E9                  	call	ECritDisk

 20042                                  ;Break	<SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE -- Set File Attribute>
 20043                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20044                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 20045                                  ; Inputs:
 20046                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20047                                  ;		terminated)
 20048                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20049                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20050                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20051                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20052                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))

 20054                                  ;	AX is new attributes to give to file
 20055                                  ; Function:
 20056                                  ;	Set File Attributes
 20057                                  ; Returns:
 20058                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20059                                  ;	    No error
 20060                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20061                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20062                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 20063                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 20064                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20065                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20066                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20067                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20068                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20069                                  ;			Attempt to set an attribute which cannot be set
 20070                                  ;			(attr_directory, attr_volume_ID)
 20071                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 20072                                  ;			Sharing mode of file did not allow the change
 20073                                  ;			(this request requires exclusive write/read access)
 20074                                  ;			(INT 24H generated)
 20075                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20076                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 20218                                  ; DUP.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 20220                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 20222                                  
 20223                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 20224                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 20225                                  ;
 20226                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 20227                                  ;
 20228                                  ;	Modification history:
 20229                                  ;
 20230                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20231                                  
 20232                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 20233                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20234                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 20235                                  ;
 20236                                  ; Inputs:
 20237                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 20238                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 20239                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 20240                                  ; Function:
 20241                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 20242                                  ; Returns:
 20243                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 20244                                  ;    Carry clear
 20245                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 20246                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 20247                                  ; NOTE:
 20248                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 20249                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 20250                                  ;	that time.
 20251                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20252                                  
 20253                                  DOS_DUP:
 20254                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20255                                  
 20256                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20257 000030BB 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 20258 000030C0 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 20259                                  
 20260                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 20261                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 20262 000030C5 E878E7                  	call	IsSFTNet
 20263 000030C8 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 20264 000030CA E83320                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 20265                                  DO_INC:
 20266                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 20267 000030CD 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 20268                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 20269 000030D0 C3                      	retn
 20270

 20272                                  ; CREATE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 20276                                  
 20277                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 20278                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 20279                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20280                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20281                                  ;
 20282                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 20283                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 20284                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 20285                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 20286                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 20287                                  ;
 20288                                  ;	Revision history:
 20289                                  ;
 20290                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 20291                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 20292                                  
 20293                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20294                                  
 20295                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20296                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20297                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 20298                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 20299                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 20300                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 20301                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 20302                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 20303                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 20304                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 20305                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 20306                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 20307                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 20308                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 20309                                  
 20310                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 20311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20312                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 20313                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 20314                                  ;
 20315                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 20316                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 20317                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20318                                  ;			terminated)
 20319                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20320                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20321                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20322                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20323                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20324                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20325                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20326                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20327                                  ;
 20328                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20329                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 20330                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 20331                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20332                                  ;		CARRY SET
 20333                                  ;		    AX is error code
 20334                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 20335                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20336                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 20337                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 20338                                  ;			error_access_denied
 20339                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 20340                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 20341                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 20342                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20343                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 20344                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 20345                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20346                                  
 20347                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20348                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20349                                  
 20350                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20351                                  	; DOSCODE:708Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 20352                                  
 20353                                  DOS_CREATE:
 20354                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20355                                  	; DOSCODE:6934h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20356                                  
 20357                                  ;hkn; dispatched to from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS set up to DOSDATA at 
 20358                                  ;hkn; this point.
 20359                                  
 20360 000030D1 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH		; Truncate is OK
 20361                                  
 20362                                  ;	Enter here from Dos_Create_New
 20363                                  ;
 20364                                  ;	(ah) = 0 iff truncate OK
 20365                                  
 20366                                  Create_inter:
 20367 000030D3 A8C0                    	TEST	AL,~(attr_all+attr_ignore+attr_volume_id) ; 80h
 20368                                  				; Mask out any meaningless bits
 20369 000030D5 7511                    	JNZ	short AttErr
 20370 000030D7 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id
 20371 000030D9 7407                    	JZ	short NoReset
 20372                                  	
 20373                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20374                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20375 000030DB 800E[1106]80            	OR	byte [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h ;AN000;FOR dbcs volid
 20376                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 20377                                  	;or	word [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h 
 20378                                  	
 20379 000030E0 B008                    	MOV	AL,attr_volume_id ; 8
 20380                                  NoReset:
 20381 000030E2 0C20                    	OR	AL,attr_archive ; File changed  ; 20h
 20382 000030E4 A850                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory+attr_device ; 50h
 20383 000030E6 7408                    	JZ	short ATT_OK
 20384                                  AttErr:
 20385 000030E8 B80500                  	MOV	AX,5		; Attribute problem
 20386                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 20387                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20388 000030EB E8EDE1                  	call	set_exerr_locus_unk
 20389 000030EE EB62                    	JMP	SHORT SET_MKND_ERR ; Gotta use MKDIR to make dirs, NEVER allow
 20390                                  				   ;	attr_device to be set.
 20391                                  ATT_OK:
 20392 000030F0 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20393 000030F4 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20394 000030F5 C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 20395 000030F9 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1
 20396 000030FC 751B                    	JNE	short TEST_RE_NET
 20397                                  
 20398                                  ;	No CDS, it must be redirected.
 20399                                  
 20400 000030FE 07                      	POP	ES
 20401                                  
 20402                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20403                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20404                                  	;test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],1
 20405 000030FF F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20406 00003104 740D                    	JZ	short NOEXTOP 		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20407                                  IFS_extopen:				    ;AN000;EO.
 20408 00003106 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO. pass create attr
 20409                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;AN000;EO. issue extended open verb
 20410 00003107 B82E11                  	mov	ax,112Eh
 20411                                  NOEXTOP2:	; 01/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20412 0000310A CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;AN000;EO.
 20413 0000310C 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;AN000;EO. trash bx
 20414 0000310D C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;AN000;EO.
 20415 00003112 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.
 20416                                  NOEXTOP:				    ;AN000;
 20417                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20418                                  
 20419                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20420                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_CREATE
 20421                                  ;ELSE
 20422 00003113 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20423                                  
 20424                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 24
 20425                                  	;INT	2FH
 20426                                  
 20427 00003114 B81811                  	mov     ax,1118h
 20428                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20429                                  	;int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE FILE
 20430                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20431                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 20432                                  			; STACK: WORD file creation mode???
 20433                                  
 20434                                  	;POP	BX			; BX is trashed anyway
 20435                                  	;retn
 20436 00003117 EBF1                    	jmp	short NOEXTOP2 ; 01/02/2024
 20437                                  ;ENDIF
 20438                                  
 20439                                  ;	We have a CDS. See if it's network
 20440                                  
 20441                                  TEST_RE_NET:
 20442                                  	;;test	word [es:si+43h],8000h

 20528                                  ;** Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.

 20534                                  ;	db	0,5,52h,50h,3,5,20h

 20541                                  CRTERRTAB:	;LABEL BYTE	; Lookup table for MakeNode returns
 20542 00003159 00                      	DB	0			; none
 20543 0000315A 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 1
 20544 0000315B 52                      	DB	error_cannot_make	; MakeNode error 2
 20545 0000315C 50                      	DB	error_file_exists	; MakeNode error 3
 20546 0000315D 03                      	DB	error_path_not_found	; MakeNode error 4
 20547 0000315E 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 5
 20548 0000315F 20                      	DB	error_sharing_violation ; MakeNode error 6
 20549                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20550 00003160 02                      	DB	error_file_not_found	; MakeNode error 7

 20552                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20553                                  
 20554                                  ; We have just created a new file. This results in the truncation of old
 20555                                  ; files. We must inform the sharer to slash all the open SFT's for this
 20556                                  ; file to the current size.
 20557                                  
 20558                                  ; If we created a volume id on the diskette, set the VOLCHNG_FLAG to logical
 20559                                  ; drive number to force a Build BPB after Media Check.

 20596                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20597                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 20598                                  ;
 20599                                  ; Inputs:
 20600                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20601                                  ;		terminated)
 20602                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20603                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20604                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20605                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20606                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20607                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20608                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20609                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20610                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 20611                                  ; Function:
 20612                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 20613                                  ; Outputs:
 20614                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20615                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20616                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20617                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 20618                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20619                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20620                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20621                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20622                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20623                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20624                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20625                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 20626                                  ;		error_file_exists
 20627                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 20628                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20629                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20630                                  
 20631                                  DOS_Create_New:
 20632 00003198 B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 20633 0000319A E936FF                  	JMP	Create_inter

 20756                                  ;
 20757                                  ; Inputs:

 20760                                  ; Function:

 20773 000031F4 740B                    	JZ	short NOTEX		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20774 000031F6 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20775

 20777 000031F7 36A1[0106]              	MOV	AX,[ss:SAVE_BX]		    ;AN000;EO.
 20778                                  	;or	[es:di+2],ax
 20779 000031FB 26094502                	OR	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AX ;AN000;EO.
 20780 000031FF 58                      	POP	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20781 00003200 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;EO.
