 24926                                  ;Break	<DIRREAD -- READ A DIRECTORY SECTOR>
 24927                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24928                                  ;
 24929                                  ; Procedure Name : DIRREAD
 24930                                  ;
 24931                                  ; Inputs:
 24932                                  ;	AX = Directory block number (relative to first block of directory)
 24933                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 24934                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = First sector of first cluster of directory
 24935                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster
 24936                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 24937                                  ; Function:
 24938                                  ;	Read the directory block into [CURBUF].
 24939                                  ; Outputs:
 24940                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM] = Next cluster (after the one skipped to)
 24941                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] Set
 24942                                  ;	ES:BP unchanged
 24943                                  ;	[CURBUF] Points to Buffer with dir sector
 24944                                  ;	Carry set if error (user said FAIL to I 24)
 24945                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed.
 24946                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24947                                  
 24948                                  ;hkn; called from dir.asm. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 24949                                  
 24950                                  ; 08/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24951                                  
 24952                                  DIRREAD:
 24953                                  
 24954                                  ; Note that ClusFac is the sectors per cluster. This is NOT necessarily
 24955                                  ; the same as what is in the DPB! In the case of the root directory, we have
 24956                                  ; ClusFac = # sectors in the root directory. The root directory is detected
 24957                                  ; by DIRStart = 0.
 24958                                  
 24959 00003EFA 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 24960                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 24961 00003EFC 3916[E30A]              	cmp	[DIRSTART_HW],dx
 24962 00003F00 7509                    	jnz	short SubDir
 24963                                  	;CMP	word [DIRSTART],0
 24964                                  	; 21/09/2023
 24965 00003F02 3916[C205]              	cmp	[DIRSTART],dx ; 0
 24966 00003F06 7503                    	jnz	short SubDir
 24967 00003F08 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 24968 00003F09 EB0C                    	JMP	short DoRead
 24969                                  
 24970                                  ; Convert the sector number in AX into cluster and sector-within-cluster pair
 24971                                  
 24972                                  SubDir:
 24973 00003F0B 88C2                    	MOV	DL,AL
 24974                                  	;and	dl,[es:bp+4]
 24975 00003F0D 26225604                	AND	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 24976                                  
 24977                                  ;	(DX) = sector-in-cluster
 24978                                  
 24979                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 24980 00003F11 268A4E05                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 24981 00003F15 D3E8                    	SHR	AX,CL
 24982                                  
 24983                                  ;	(DX) = position in cluster
 24984                                  ;	(AX) = number of clusters to skip
 24985                                  
 24986                                  DoRead:
 24987 00003F17 8816[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],DL
 24988 00003F1B 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX
 24989 00003F1D 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 24990                                  
 24991                                  ;	(CX) = number of clusters to skip.
 24992                                  ;	(AH) = remainder
 24993                                  
 24994                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24995                                  
 24996                                  ; 08/02/2024
 24997                                  %if 0
 24998                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24999                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC+2]	     	  ;>32mb
 25000                                  	;MOV	[HIGH_SECTOR],DX	  ;>32mb
 25001                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC]
 25002                                  	;ADD	DL,AH
 25003                                  	;ADC	DH,0
 25004                                  	;ADC	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0	  ;>32mb
 25005                                  	; 21/09/2023
 25006                                  	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 25007                                  	mov	dx,[DIRSEC]
 25008                                  	add	dl,ah
 25009                                  	adc	dh,bl ; 0
 25010                                  	adc	bx,[DIRSEC+2]
 25011                                  	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],bx
 25012                                  
 25013                                  	MOV	BX,[CLUSNUM]
 25014                                  	MOV	[NXTCLUSNUM],BX
 25015                                  	JCXZ	FIRSTCLUSTER
 25016                                  %else
 25017                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 25018 00003F1F 8B1E[E50A]              	mov	bx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 25019 00003F23 891E[E70A]              	mov	[NXTCLUSNUM_HW],bx
 25020 00003F27 891E[EF0A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 25021 00003F2B 8B16[C005]              	mov	dx,[DIRSEC+2]
 25022 00003F2F 8916[0706]              	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],dx
 25023 00003F33 8B16[BE05]              	mov	dx,[DIRSEC]
 25024 00003F37 00E2                    	add	dl,ah
 25025 00003F39 80D600                  	adc	dh,0
 25026 00003F3C 8316[0706]00            	adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 25027 00003F41 8B1E[BC05]              	mov	bx,[CLUSNUM]
 25028 00003F45 891E[DC05]              	mov	[NXTCLUSNUM],bx
 25029 00003F49 E339                    	jcxz	FIRSTCLUSTER
 25030                                  %endif
 25031                                  
 25032                                  SKPCLLP:
 25033 00003F4B E88D21                  	call	UNPACK
 25034 00003F4E 72A9                    	jc	short get_io_sft_retn
 25035                                  	;;;
 25036                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 25037 00003F50 FF36[EF0A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]

 25074                                  
 25075                                  SET_BUF_AS_DIR:
 25076                                  
 25077                                  ;	Set the type of CURBUF to be a directory sector.
 25078                                  ;	Only flags are modified.
 25079                                  
 25080 00003F89 1E                      	PUSH	DS

 25087                                  dirread_retn:

 25090                                  ;Break	<FATSECRD -- READ A FAT SECTOR>
 25091                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25092                                  ;
 25093                                  ; Procedure Name : FATSECRD
 25094                                  ; Inputs:
 25095                                  ;	Same as DREAD
 25096                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25097                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25098                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number
 25099                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25100                                  ; Function:
 25101                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform FAT read.
 25102                                  ; Outputs:
 25103                                  ;	Same as DREAD
 25104                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25105                                  
 25106                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25107                                  	; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25108                                  
 25109                                  	; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25110                                  
 25111                                  FATSECRD:
 25112                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25113                                  	;mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],18h
 25114 00003F96 36C606[4B03]18          	MOV	byte [SS:ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL
 25115 00003F9C 89CF                    	MOV	DI,CX
 25116                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+8]
 25117 00003F9E 268A4E08                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_COUNT]
 25118                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25119                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0Fh]
 25120                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_SIZE]
 25121                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 25122                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25123                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+0Fh]
 25124 00003FA2 268B460F                	MOV	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_SIZE] ;>32mb
 25125 00003FA6 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH
 25126                                  	;;;
 25127                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25128 00003FA8 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 25129 00003FAA 7509                    	jnz	short FATSECRD_cont	; not FAT32
 25130                                  	;test	byte [es:bp+23h],80h
 25131 00003FAC 26F6462380              	test	byte [es:bp+DPB.EXT_FLAGS],80h ; (FAT32 bs extd flags bit 7)
 25132 00003FB1 7402                    	jz      short FATSECRD_cont
 25133                                  	;mov	cx,1           		; only one FAT is active
 25134 00003FB3 B101                    	mov	cl,1
 25135                                  FATSECRD_cont:
 25136 00003FB5 36FF36[0706]            	push	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 25137                                  	;;;
 25138 00003FBA 52                      	PUSH	DX
 25139                                  NXTFAT:
 25140                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25141                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25142                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 25143                                  	;MOV	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR],0	;>32mb FAT sectors cannot exceed
 25144 00003FBB 51                      	PUSH	CX			;32mb
 25145 00003FBC 50                      	PUSH	AX
 25146                                  	;;;
 25147                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25148 00003FBD 36FF36[0706]            	push	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 25149 00003FC2 52                      	push	dx
 25150                                  	;;;
 25151 00003FC3 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 25152 00003FC5 E88600                  	call	DSKREAD
 25153                                  	;;;
 25154                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25155 00003FC8 5A                      	pop	dx
 25156 00003FC9 368F06[0706]            	pop	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 25157                                  	;;;
 25158 00003FCE 58                      	POP	AX
 25159 00003FCF 59                      	POP	CX
 25160 00003FD0 7440                    	JZ	short RET41P		; Carry clear
 25161                                  	;;;
 25162                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 25340                                  ;	NAME	Disk2
 25341                                  
 25342                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 25343                                  ;
 25344                                  ;	DskRead
 25345                                  ;	DWRITE
 25346                                  ;	DSKWRITE
 25347                                  ;	HarderrRW
 25348                                  ;	SETUP

 25359                                  ;	Revision history:
 25360                                  ;
 25361                                  ;		AN000 version 4.00 Jan. 1988
 25362                                  ;		M039 DB 10/17/90 - Disk read/write optimization
 25363                                  
 25364                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25365                                  ; DOSCODE:7699h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25366                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25367                                  ; DOSCODE:7685h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25368                                  
 25369                                  ;Break	<DSKREAD -- PHYSICAL DISK READ>
 25370                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25371                                  ;
 25372                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKREAD
 25373                                  ;
 25374                                  ; Inputs:
 25375                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25376                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25377                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25378                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25379                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25380                                  ; Function:
 25381                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25382                                  ; Outputs:
 25383                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25384                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25385                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25386                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25387                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25388                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25389                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25390                                  
 25391                                  DSKREAD:
 25392 0000404E 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25393                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25394 0000404F 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25395                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25396 00004053 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25397 00004057 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25398 00004058 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25399 00004059 E8AC11                  	call	SETREAD
 25400 0000405C EB22                    	JMP	short DODSKOP
 25401                                  
 25402                                  ;Break	<DWRITE -- SEE ABOUT WRITING>
 25403                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25404                                  ;
 25405                                  ; Procedure Name : DWRITE
 25406                                  ;
 25407                                  ; Inputs:
 25408                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25409                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25410                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25411                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25412                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25413                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case HARDERR called
 25414                                  ; Function:
 25415                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk write. If BIOS reports
 25416                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 25417                                  ; Output:
 25418                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently, user FAILed to I 24)
 25419                                  ; BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 25420                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25421                                  
 25422                                  	;entry	DWRITE
 25423                                  DWRITE:
 25424 0000405E E81100                  	CALL	DSKWRITE
 25425 00004061 74EA                    	jz	short dw_ret_label	; Carry clear (retz)
 25426                                  
 25427                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25428 00004063 36C606[7505]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:READOP],1	; Write
 25429 00004069 E83500                  	call	HARDERRRW
 25430 0000406C 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1			; Check for retry
 25431 0000406E 74EE                    	JZ	short DWRITE

 25434                                  %if 0
 25435                                  	CMP	AL,3			; Check for FAIL
 25436                                  	CLC
 25437                                  	JNZ	short NO_CAR2 		; Ignore
 25438                                  	STC

 25440                                  dw_ret_label:
 25441                                  	retn

 25443                                  	; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 25444 00004070 EB99                    	jmp	short fail_ignore
 25445                                  %endif

 25447                                  ;Break	<DSKWRITE -- PHYSICAL DISK WRITE>
 25448                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25449                                  ;
 25450                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKWRITE
 25451                                  ;
 25452                                  ; Inputs:
 25453                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25454                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25455                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25456                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25457                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25458                                  ; Function:
 25459                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25460                                  ; Outputs:
 25461                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25462                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25463                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25464                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25465                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25466                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25467                                  ;
 25468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25469                                  
 25470                                  	;entry	DSKWRITE
 25471                                  DSKWRITE:
 25472 00004072 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25473                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25474 00004073 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25475                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25476 00004077 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25477 0000407B 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25478 0000407C 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25479 0000407D E8BB11                  	call	SETWRITE
 25480                                  DODSKOP:
 25481 00004080 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS		; Save DS
 25482 00004082 1F                      	POP	DS		; DS:BP points to DPB
 25483 00004083 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 25484                                  
 25485                                  	;lds	si,[ds:bp+13h] ; 04/05/2019
 25486 00004084 3EC57613                	LDS	SI,[ds:BP+DPB.DRIVER_ADDR] ; 07/09/2018
 25487 00004088 E8F910                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 25488                                  
 25489 0000408B 8ED9                    	MOV	DS,CX		; Restore DS
 25490 0000408D 07                      	POP	ES		; Restore ES
 25491 0000408E 5B                      	POP	BX
 25492

 25494 0000408F 368B0E[6C03]            	MOV	CX,[SS:CALLSCNT] ; Number of sectors transferred

 25498                                  
 25499                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25500 00004099 36A1[5D03]              	MOV	AX,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 25501                                  	;test	ax,8000h

 25503                                  	;test	ah,80h
 25504 0000409D F6C480                  	test	ah,(STERR>>8)
 25505                                  	;test	AX,STERR
 25506 000040A0 C3                      	retn
 25507                                  
 25508                                  ;Break	<HardErrRW - map extended errors and call harderr>
 25509                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 25511                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErrRW
 25512                                  ;
 25513                                  ; Inputs:
 25514                                  ;	AX is error code from read or write
 25515                                  ;	Other registers set as per HARDERR
 25516                                  ; Function:
 25517                                  ;	Checks the error code for special extended
 25518                                  ;	errors and maps them if needed. Then invokes
 25519                                  ;	Harderr
 25520                                  ; Outputs:
 25521                                  ;	Of HARDERR
 25522                                  ; AX may be modified prior to call to HARDERR.
 25523                                  ; No other registers altered.
 25524                                  ;

 25560                                  
 25561                                  ;Break	<SETUP -- SETUP A DISK READ OR WRITE FROM USER>
 25562                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25563                                  ;
 25564                                  ; Procedure Name : SETUP
 25565                                  ;
 25566                                  ; Inputs:
 25567                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT (value also in THISSFT)
 25568                                  ;	DMAAdd contains transfer address
 25569                                  ;	CX = Byte count
 25570                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25571                                  ;   WARNING Stack must be clean, two ret addrs on stack, 1st of caller,
 25572                                  ;		2nd of caller of caller.
 25573                                  ; Outputs:
 25574                                  ;	    CX = byte count
 25575                                  ;	    [THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters if file
 25576                                  ;		      = Pointer to device header if device or NET
 25577                                  ;	    ES:DI Points to SFT
 25578                                  ;	    [NEXTADD] = Displacement of disk transfer within segment
 25579                                  ;	    [TRANS] = 0 (No transfers yet)
 25580                                  ;	    BytPos = Byte position in file
 25581                                  ;
 25582                                  ;	The following fields are relevant to local files (not devices) only:
 25583                                  ;
 25584                                  ;	    SecPos = Position of first sector (local files only)
 25585                                  ;	    [BYTSECPOS] = Byte position in first sector (local files only)
 25586                                  ;	    [CLUSNUM] = First cluster (local files only)
 25587                                  ;	    [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector within first cluster (local files only)
 25588                                  ;	    [THISDRV] = Physical unit number (local files only)
 25589                                  ;
 25590                                  ;      RETURNS ONE LEVEL UP WITH:
 25591                                  ;	   CX = 0
 25592                                  ;	   CARRY = Clear
 25593                                  ;	IF AN ERROR IS DETECTED
 25594                                  ; All other registers destroyed
 25595                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25596                                  
 25597                                  ;hkn; called from disk.asm. DS has been set up to DOSDATA.
 25598                                  
 25599                                  ; DOSCODE:770Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25600                                  
 25601                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25602                                  ; DOSCODE:76F7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25603                                  
 25604                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25605                                  ; DOSCODE:80D8h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 25606                                  
 25607                                  SETUP:
 25608                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 411Bh
 25609                                  
 25610                                  	;lds 	si,[es:di+7]
 25611 000040BA 26C57507                	LDS	SI,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr]
 25612                                  
 25613                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25614 000040BE 368C1E[8C05]            	MOV	[SS:THISDPB+2],DS
 25615                                  
 25616                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25617 000040C3 16                      	push	ss
 25618 000040C4 1F                      	pop	ds
 25619                                  
 25620 000040C5 8936[8A05]              	MOV	[THISDPB],SI
 25621                                  
 25622 000040C9 8B1E[2C03]              	MOV	BX,[DMAADD]
 25623 000040CD 891E[B805]              	MOV	[NEXTADD],BX		;Set NEXTADD to start of Xaddr
 25624 000040D1 C606[7405]00            	MOV	BYTE [TRANS],0		;No transferes
 25625                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+15h]
 25626 000040D6 268B4515                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position]
 25627                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+17h]
 25628 000040DA 268B5517                	MOV	DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position+2]
 25629 000040DE 8916[D005]              	MOV	[BYTPOS+2],DX		;Set it
 25630 000040E2 A3[CE05]                	MOV	[BYTPOS],AX
 25631                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],8080h
 25632 000040E5 26F745058080            	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet+devid_device
 25633 000040EB 7555                    	JNZ	short NOSETSTUFF	;Following not done on devs or NET
 25634 000040ED 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25635 000040EE C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		;Point at the DPB
 25636                                  
 25637                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25638                                  	;;mov	bl,[es:bp+0]
 25639                                  	;MOV	BL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 25640                                  	; 05/12/2022
 25641 000040F2 268A5E00                	mov	bl,[es:bp]
 25642                                  	
 25643 000040F6 881E[7605]              	MOV	[THISDRV],BL		;Set THISDRV
 25644                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 25645 000040FA 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 25646                                  
 25647                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3
 25648                                  	;cmp	dx,bx
 25649                                  	;jnb	short EOFERR
 25650                                  	;div	bx
 25651                                  	;mov	[SECPOS],ax
 25652                                  	;mov	[BYTSECPOS],dx
 25653                                  	;mov	dx,ax
 25654                                  	;;and	al,[es:bp+4]
 25655                                  	;AND	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 25656                                  	;mov	[SECCLUSPOS],al
 25657                                  	;mov	ax,cx
 25658                                  	;;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 25659                                  	;MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 25660                                  	;shr	dx,cl
 25661                                  	;mov	[CLUSNUM],dx
 25662                                  	;pop	es
 25663                                  	;mov	cx,ax
 25664                                  
 25665                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25666                                  
 25667                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25668                                  ;M039: Optimized this section.
 25669 000040FE 51                              PUSH    CX			;SHR32 and DIV32 use CX.
 25670 000040FF E81B06                  	call	DIV32			;DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem)
 25671 00004102 8916[CC05]              	MOV	[BYTSECPOS],DX
 25672 00004106 A3[C405]                	MOV	[SECPOS],AX
 25673 00004109 890E[C605]              	MOV	[SECPOS+2],CX

 25742                                  ;Break	<BREAKDOWN -- CUT A USER READ OR WRITE INTO PIECES>
 25743                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25744                                  ;
 25745                                  ; Procedure Name : BREAKDOWN
 25746                                  ;
 25747                                  ; Inputs:
 25748                                  ;	CX = Length of disk transfer in bytes
 25749                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25750                                  ;	[BYTSECPOS] = Byte position within first sector
 25751                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25752                                  ; Outputs:
 25753                                  ;	[BYTCNT1] = Bytes to transfer in first sector
 25754                                  ;	[SECCNT] = No. of whole sectors to transfer
 25755                                  ;	[BYTCNT2] = Bytes to transfer in last sector
 25756                                  ; AX, BX, DX destroyed. No other registers affected.
 25757                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25758                                  
 25759                                  BREAKDOWN:
 25760 0000415D A1[CC05]                	MOV	AX,[BYTSECPOS]
 25761 00004160 89CB                    	MOV	BX,CX
 25762 00004162 09C0                    	OR	AX,AX
 25763 00004164 740E                    	JZ	short SAVFIR	; Partial first sector?
 25764                                  	;sub	ax,[es:bp+2]
 25765 00004166 262B4602                	SUB	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 25766 0000416A F7D8                    	NEG	AX		; Max number of bytes left in first sector
 25767 0000416C 29C3                    	SUB	BX,AX		; Subtract from total length
 25768 0000416E 7304                    	JAE	short SAVFIR
 25769 00004170 01D8                    	ADD	AX,BX		; Don't use all of the rest of the sector
 25770 00004172 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX		; And no bytes are left
 25771                                  SAVFIR:
 25772 00004174 A3[D205]                	MOV	[BYTCNT1],AX
 25773 00004177 89D8                    	MOV	AX,BX
 25774 00004179 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 25775                                  	;div	word [ES:BP+2]
 25776 0000417B 26F77602                	DIV	word [ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; How many whole sectors?
 25777 0000417F A3[D605]                	MOV	[SECCNT],AX
 25778 00004182 8916[D405]              	MOV	[BYTCNT2],DX	; Bytes remaining for last sector
 25779                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25780                                  	;OR	DX,[BYTCNT1]	; SMR ONESECTORFIX BUGBUG
 25781                                  	;retnz			; NOT (BYTCNT1 = BYTCNT2 = 0)
 25782                                  	;CMP	AX,1
 25783                                  	;retnz
 25784                                  	;MOV	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Buffer EXACT one sector I/O
 25785                                  	;MOV	[BYTCNT2],AX
 25786                                  	;MOV	[SECCNT],DX	; DX = 0
 25787                                  _RET45:
 25788 00004186 C3                      	retn

 26323                                  ;Break   <DskRdBufScan -- Disk Read Buffer Scan>
 26324                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26325                                  ;
 26326                                  ; Procedure Name : DskRdBufScan
 26327                                  ;
 26328                                  ; Inputs:
 26329                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors read. (These constitute a block of
 26330                                  ;            sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 26331                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 26332                                  ;       [TEMP_VAR2]:[TEMP_VAR] = Transfer address (destination data address).
 26333                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 26334                                  ;
 26335                                  ; Function:
 26336                                  ;	The Buffer Queue is scanned: the contents of any dirty buffers are
 26337                                  ;	"read" into the transfer memory block, so that the transfer memory
 26338                                  ;	reflects the most recent data.
 26339                                  ;
 26340                                  ; Outputs:
 26341                                  ;       Transfer memory updated as required.
 26342                                  ;
 26343                                  ; Uses:
 26344                                  ;       DS,AX,BX,CX,SI,DI destroyed.
 26345                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 26346                                  ;
 26347                                  ; Notes:
 26348                                  ;       FIRST_BUFF_ADDR is set-up to contain the LAST buffer to check, rather
 26349                                  ;	than the FIRST.
 26350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26351                                  ;M039: Created
 26352                                  
 26353                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26354                                  ; DOSCODE:78F0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26355                                  
 26356                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26357                                  ; DOSCODE:78DCh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26358                                  
 26359                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26360                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8313h
 26361                                  
 26362                                  ;procedure DskRdBufScan,NEAR
 26363                                  ;
 26364                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 26365                                  
 26366                                  DskRdBufScan:
 26367 000042E0 36833E[7100]00          	cmp	word [ss:DirtyBufferCount],0 ; Any dirty buffers?
 26368 000042E6 743C                    	je	short bufx		     ; -no, skip all work.
 26369                                  
 26370 000042E8 368B1E[0706]            	mov     bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 26371 000042ED 89DE                    	mov     si,bx
 26372 000042EF 01D1                    	add     cx,dx
 26373 000042F1 83D600                  	adc     si,0
 26374                                  
 26375 000042F4 E8AB21                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> 1st buf in queue.
 26376                                  	;mov	ax,[di+2]
 26377 000042F7 8B4502                  	mov     ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]
 26378 000042FA 36A3[A512]              	mov     [ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],ax
 26379                                  		
 26380                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26381                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 26382                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 26383                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26384 000042FE 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 26385                                  
 26386                                  ;       BX:DX = Extent start.
 26387                                  ;       SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 26388                                  ;          AL = Drive #.
 26389                                  ;       DS:DI-> 1st buffer in queue.
 26390                                  ;[FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] = Address offset of last buffer in queue.
 26391                                  
 26392                                  bufq:	
 26393                                  	;cmp	al,[di+4]
 26394 00004302 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 26395 00004305 7514                    	jne	short bufq1        	;  -no, jump.
 26396                                  
 26397                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26398                                  ;       ja	short bufq1		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 26399                                  
 26400                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 26401 00004307 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26402 0000430A 7503                    	jne	short bufq01
 26403                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 26404 0000430C 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26405                                  bufq01:
 26406 0000430F 770A                    	ja	short bufq1
 26407                                  
 26408                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26409                                  ;       ja	short bufq2		;Jump if Extent end >= buffer sector.
 26410                                  
 26411                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 26412 00004311 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26413 00004314 7503                    	jne	short bufq02
 26414                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 26415 00004316 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26416                                  bufq02:
 26417 00004319 770A                    	ja	short bufq2
 26418                                  bufq1:	
 26419 0000431B 363B3E[A512]            	cmp     di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 26420 00004320 8B3D                    	mov	di,[di]
 26421                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next] ; Set-up for next buffer.
 26422 00004322 75DE                    	jne	short bufq		; -no, do next buffer
 26423                                  bufx:
 26424 00004324 C3                      	retn				;Exit.
 26425                                  
 26426                                  ;       Buffer's sector is in Extent: if it is dirty, copy its contents to
 26427                                  ;	transfer memory; otherwise, just re-position it in the buffer queue
 26428                                  ;       as MRU (Most Recently Used).
 26429                                  
 26430                                  bufq2:	
 26431 00004325 50                      	push	ax
 26432                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 26433 00004326 F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 26434 0000432A 7430                    	jz	short bufq3                    ; -no, jump.
 26435                                  
 26436                                  ;       SaveReg <cx,dx,si,di,es>
 26437 0000432C 51                      	push	cx
 26438 0000432D 52                      	push	dx
 26439 0000432E 56                      	push	si
 26440 0000432F 57                      	push	di
 26441 00004330 06                      	push	es
 26442                                  
 26443 00004331 89D0                    	mov     ax,dx
 26444                                  	;sub	ax,[di+6]
 26445 00004333 2B4506                  	sub	ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26446 00004336 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 26447                                  
 26448                                  ;       AX = offset (in sectors) of buffer sector within Transfer memory
 26449                                  ;            block. (Note: the upper word of the sector # may be ignored
 26450                                  ;	     since no more than 64k bytes will ever be read. This 64k limit
 26451                                  ;            is imposed by the input parameters of the disk read operation.)
 26452                                  
 26453                                  	;lea	si,[di+20]
 26454 00004338 8D7518                  	lea	si,[di+BUFINSIZ]	;DS:SI -> buffer data.
 26455                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 26456 0000433B 268B4E02                	mov     cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ;CX = sector size (in bytes).
 26457 0000433F F7E1                    	mul     cx			;AX = offset (in bytes) of buf. sector
 26458                                  	;mov	di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 26459                                  	; 09/02/2024
 26460 00004341 36C43E[0C06]            	les	di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 26461 00004346 01C7                    	add	di,ax
 26462                                  	;mov	es,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]
 26463 00004348 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 26464                                  
 26465                                  ;	   CX = sector size (in WORDs) ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 26466                                  ;       DS:SI-> Buffer sector data.
 26467                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 26468                                  
 26469                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26470                                  %if 0
 26471                                  	rep	movsw			;Copy buffer sector to Transfer memory
 26472                                  	;; 04/05/2019
 26473                                  	;;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 26474                                  	;;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 26475                                  	;jnc	short bufq03	
 26476                                  	;movsb
 26477                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26478                                  	;adc	cx,0
 26479                                  	;rep	movsb
 26480                                  	; 22/09/2023
 26481                                  	jnc	short bufq03
 26482                                  	movsb
 26483                                  %else
 26484                                  	;;;
 26485                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 26486 0000434A 36803E[6A00]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0
 26487 00004350 7403                    	jz	short bufq03+1 ; rep movsw (skip 32 bit prefix)
 26488 00004352 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 26489                                  bufq03:
 26490 00004354 F366A5                  	rep	movsd
 26491                                  	;;;
 26492                                  %endif
 26493                                  
 26494                                  ;bufq03:	; 09/02/2024
 26495                                  	;RestoreReg <es,di,si,dx,cx>
 26496 00004357 07                      	pop	es
 26497 00004358 5F                      	pop	di
 26498 00004359 5E                      	pop	si
 26499 0000435A 5A                      	pop	dx
 26500 0000435B 59                      	pop	cx
 26501                                  
 26502                                  ;       DS:DI -> current buffer.
 26503                                  bufq3:	
 26504 0000435C 89F8                    	mov     ax,di			;DS:AX -> Current buffer.
 26505                                          ;invoke SCANPLACE
 26506 0000435E E85321                  	call	SCANPLACE
 26507 00004361 363B06[A512]            	cmp	ax,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] ;Last buffer?
 26508 00004366 58                      	pop	ax
 26509                                  	;jne	short bufq		; -no, jump.
 26510                                  	;;jmp	short bufx		; -yes, exit.
 26511                                  	;; 12/06/2019
 26512                                  	;retn
 26513                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compability)
 26514 00004367 7599                    	jne	short bufq
 26515                                  	;jmp	short bufx
 26516                                  	; 09/02/2024
 26517 00004369 C3                      	retn	; Exit
 26518                                  
 26519                                  ;EndProc DskRdBufScan

 26527                                  ;Break   <DISKWRITE -- PERFORM USER DISK WRITE>

 26529                                  ;
 26530                                  ; Procedure Name : DISKWRITE
 26531                                  ;
 26532                                  ; Inputs:
 26533                                  ;       Outputs of SETUP
 26534                                  ; Function:
 26535                                  ;       Perform disk write
 26536                                  ; Outputs:
 26537                                  ;    Carry clear
 26538                                  ;       CX = No. of bytes written
 26539                                  ;       ES:DI point to SFT
 26540                                  ;       SFT offset and cluster pointers updated
 26541                                  ;    Carry set
 26542                                  ;       CX = 0
 26543                                  ;       ES:DI point to SFT
 26544                                  ;       AX has error code
 26545                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26546                                  
 26547                                  ;hkn; called by DOS_WRITE. DS already set up at this point.
 26548                                  
 26549                                  ; DOSCODE:797Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26550                                  
 26551                                  ; 20/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26552                                  ; DOSCODE:7966h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26553                                  
 26554                                  ; 10/02/2024
 26555                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26556                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:83A3h
 26557

 26560

 26562                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 26563                                  	; IBMDOS.COM - Offset 436Dh
 26564                                  	;;test	byte [es:di+4],8
 26565                                  	;TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr],attr_volume_id
 26566                                  	;jz	short write_cont
 26567                                  	;jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS

 26570                                  	;or	cx,cx
 26571                                  	;jnz	short Not_Truncate

 26576                                  	;pop	cx
 26577                                  	;jnb	short _WRITE_OK
 26578                                  	;call	WRITE_LOCK_VIOLATION
 26579                                  	;jnb	short DISKWRITE
 26580                                  	;retn
 26581                                  
 26582                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26583 0000436A E8ACFC                  	call	CHECK_WRITE_LOCK	;IFS. check write lock	;AN000;
 26584                                  	; 19/08/2018
 26585 0000436D 7304                    	JNC	short _WRITE_OK		;IFS. lock check ok	;AN000;
 26586 0000436F C3                      	retn
 26587                                  
 26588                                  WRTEOFJ:
 26589 00004370 E95902                  	JMP     WRTEOF
 26590                                  
 26591                                  _WRITE_OK:
 26592                                   	; 27/07/2018
 26593                                  	; IBMDOS.COM - Offset 438Eh
 26594                                  	
 26595                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 26596                                  	;and	word [es:di+5],0BFBFh
 26597 00004373 26816505BFBF            	AND     word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],~(sf_close_nodate|devid_file_clean)
 26598                                  				; Mark file as dirty, clear no date on close
 26599                                  ; 10/02/2024
 26600                                  %if 0
 26601                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26602                                  
 26603                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26604                                  	;mov 	ax,[es:di+11h]
 26605                                  	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size]		;M039
 26606                                          MOV	[TEMP_VAR],AX                           ;M039
 26607                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+13h]
 26608                                  	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size+2]		;M039
 26609                                          MOV	[TEMP_VAR2],AX                          ;M039
 26610                                  %else
 26611                                  	; 10/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS COM)
 26612                                  	;les	ax,[es:di+11h]
 26613 00004379 26C44511                	les	ax,[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_size]
 26614 0000437D 8C06[0E06]              	mov	[TEMP_VAR2],es
 26615 00004381 A3[0C06]                	mov	[TEMP_VAR],ax
 26616                                  %endif
 26617                                  
 26618                                  ;	TEMP_VAR2:TEMP_VAR = Current file size (sf_size);M039
 26619                                  
 26620                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 26621 00004384 C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 26622                                  
 26623 00004388 E8D2FD                  	call	BREAKDOWN
 26624                                  
 26625 0000438B A1[CE05]                	MOV     AX,[BYTPOS]
 26626 0000438E 8B16[D005]              	MOV     DX,[BYTPOS+2]
 26627 00004392 E3DC                    	JCXZ    WRTEOFJ                 ;Make the file length = sf_position
 26628 00004394 01C8                    	ADD     AX,CX
 26629 00004396 83D200                  	ADC     DX,0                    ;DX:AX = last byte to write + 1.
 26630                                  	
 26631                                  	;;;
 26632                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 26633 00004399 7303                    	jnc	short dskwrt_1
 26634                                  ACC_ERRWJ2:
 26635                                  	;;jmp	SET_ACC_ERRW
 26636                                  	;jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS ; ds<>ss ; 10/02/2024
 26637                                  	; 10/02/2024
 26638                                  	; ds=ss
 26639 0000439B E959FE                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 26640

 27514                                  
 27515                                  ;Break   <DskWrtBufPurge -- Disk Write Buffer Purge>
 27516                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27517                                  ;
 27518                                  ; Procedure Name : DskWrtBufPurge
 27519                                  ;
 27520                                  ; Inputs:
 27521                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 27522                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 27523                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 27524                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 27525                                  ;
 27526                                  ; Function:
 27527                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 27528                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 27529                                  ;
 27530                                  ; Outputs:
 27531                                  ;       (Same as Input.)
 27532                                  ; Uses:
 27533                                  ;       All registers except DS,AX,SI,DI preserved.
 27534                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 27535                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27536                                  ;M039: Created
 27537                                  
 27538                                  ;procedure   DskWrtBufPurge,NEAR
 27539                                  ;
 27540                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 27541                                  
 27542                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27543                                  ; DOSCODE:7C0Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27544                                  
 27545                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27546                                  ; DOSCODE:7BD4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27547                                  
 27548                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27549                                  ; DOSCODE:8714h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 27550                                  
 27551                                  ; NOTE: Secondary (Buffer) Cache is not used in PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27552                                  
 27553                                  ; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:BB93h)
 27554                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - DOSCODE:7C0Eh)
 27555                                  
 27556                                  DskWrtBufPurge:
 27557                                  	;SaveReg <bx,cx>
 27558 000046D0 53                      	push	bx
 27559 000046D1 51                      	push	cx
 27560                                  
 27561 000046D2 368B1E[0706]            	mov	bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	;BX:DX = Extent start (sector #).
 27562 000046D7 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 27563 000046D9 01D1                    	add	cx,dx
 27564 000046DB 83D600                  	adc	si,0                    ;SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27565                                  
 27566                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27567                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 27568                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 27569                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27570 000046DE 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 27571                                  
 27572                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 27573                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27574                                  %if 0
 27575                                  
 27576                                  ;	BX:DX = Extent start.
 27577                                  ;	SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27578                                  ;	AL = Drive #
 27579                                  
 27580                                  	cmp	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0 ;Secondary cache in-use?
 27581                                  	je	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27582                                  
 27583                                  ;	If any of the sectors to be written are in the secondary cache (SC),
 27584                                  ;	invalidate the entire SC. (This is an optimization; we really only
 27585                                  ;	need to invalidate those sectors which intersect, but that's slower.)
 27586                                  
 27587                                  	cmp	al,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	;Same drive?
 27588                                  	jne	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27589                                  
 27590                                  	push    ax
 27591                                  	mov     ax,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]
 27592                                  	mov     di,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]	;DI:AX = SC start.
 27593                                  
 27594                                  	;Cmp32	si,cx,di,ax		;Extent end < SC start?
 27595                                  	;jbe	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27596                                  
 27597                                  	cmp	si,di
 27598                                  	jne	short sc01
 27599                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 27600                                  sc01: 
 27601                                  	jbe	short sc5
 27602                                  
 27603                                  	add	ax,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]
 27604                                  	adc	di,0                    ;DI:AX = SC end + 1.
 27605                                  	
 27606                                  	;Cmp32	bx,dx,di,ax             ;Extent start > SC end?
 27607                                  	;jae	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27608                                  
 27609                                  	cmp	bx,di
 27610                                  	jne	short sc02
 27611                                  	cmp	dx,ax
 27612                                  sc02:
 27613                                  	jnb	short sc5
 27614                                  
 27615                                  	mov	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	;Extent intersects SC: invalidate SC.
 27616                                  sc5:	
 27617                                  	pop     ax
 27618                                  
 27619                                  %endif
 27620                                  
 27621                                  ;	Free any buffered sectors which are in Extent; they are being over-
 27622                                  ;	written.
 27623                                  
 27624                                  nosc:	
 27625 000046E2 E8BD1D                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> first buffer in queue.
 27626                                  
 27627                                  _bufq:	
 27628                                  	;cmpo	al,[di+4]
 27629 000046E5 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 27630 000046E8 7527                    	jne	short bufq5		; -no, jump.
 27631                                  
 27632                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27633                                  ;       ja	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 27634                                  
 27635                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 27636 000046EA 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27637 000046ED 7503                    	jne	short bufq04
 27638                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 27639 000046EF 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27640                                  bufq04:
 27641 000046F2 771D                    	ja	short bufq5
 27642                                  
 27643                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27644                                  ;       jbe	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent end < buffer sector.
 27645                                  
 27646                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 27647 000046F4 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27648 000046F7 7503                    	jne	short bufq05
 27649                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 27650 000046F9 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27651                                  bufq05:
 27652 000046FC 7613                    	jbe	short bufq5
 27653                                  
 27654                                  ;	Buffer's sector is in Extent, so free it; it is being over-written.
 27655                                  
 27656                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 27657 000046FE F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 27658 00004702 7403                    	jz	short bufq4		; -no, jump.
 27659 00004704 E82820                  	call	DEC_DIRTY_COUNT		; -yes, decrement dirty count.
 27660                                  bufq4:
 27661                                  	;mov	word [di+4],20FFh
 27662 00004707 C74504FF20              	mov     word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],((buf_visit<<8)|0FFh)
 27663                                  
 27664 0000470C E8A51D                  	call	SCANPLACE
 27665 0000470F EB02                    	jmp     short bufq6
 27666                                  bufq5: 
 27667 00004711 8B3D                    	mov     di,[di]
 27668                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 27669                                  bufq6: 
 27670 00004713 363B3E[A512]            	cmp	di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 27671 00004718 75CB                    	jne	short _bufq		; --no, go do next buffer.
 27672                                  	
 27673                                  	;RestoreReg <cx,bx>
 27674 0000471A 59                      	pop	cx
 27675 0000471B 5B                      	pop	bx
 27676 0000471C C3                      	retn
 27677                                  
 27678                                  ;EndProc DskWrtBufPurge
 27679                                  
 27680                                  ;Break   <DIV32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT DIVIDE>
 27681                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27682                                  ;
 27683                                  ; Procedure Name : DIV32
 27684                                  ;
 27685                                  ; Inputs:
 27686                                  ;       DX:AX = 32 bit dividend   BX= divisor
 27687                                  ; Function:
 27688                                  ;       Perform 32 bit division:  DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)
 27689                                  ; Outputs:
 27690                                  ;       CX:AX = quotient , DX= remainder
 27691                                  ; Uses:
 27692                                  ;       All registers except AX,CX,DX preserved.
 27693                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27694                                  ;M039: DIV32 optimized for divisor of 512 (common sector size).
 27695                                  
 27696                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27697                                  ; DOSCODE:7C94h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27698                                  
 27699                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27700                                  ; DOSCODE:7C5Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27701                                  
 27702                                  DIV32:
 27703 0000471D 81FB0002                	cmp	bx,512
 27704 00004721 7515                    	jne	short div5
 27705                                  
 27706 00004723 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 27707 00004725 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax           ; CX:AX = Dividend
 27708 00004727 81E2FF01                	and	dx,(512-1)      ; DX = Remainder
 27709 0000472B 88E0                    	mov	al,ah
 27710 0000472D 88CC                    	mov	ah,cl
 27711 0000472F 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 27712 00004731 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 27713 00004733 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 27714 00004735 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 27715 00004737 C3                      	retn
 27716                                  div5:	
 27717 00004738 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 27718 0000473A 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 27719 0000473C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 27720 0000473E F7F3                    	div	bx              ; 0:AX/BX
 27721 00004740 91                      	xchg	cx,ax
 27722 00004741 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; DX:AX/BX
 27723 00004743 C3                      	retn
 27724                                  
 27725                                  ;Break   <SHR32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT SHIFT RIGHT>
 27726                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27727                                  ;
 27728                                  ; Procedure Name : SHR32
 27729                                  ;
 27730                                  ; Inputs:
 27731                                  ;	DX:AX = 32 bit sector number
 27732                                  ; Function:
 27733                                  ;       Perform 32 bit shift right
 27734                                  ; Outputs:
 27735                                  ;	AX = cluster number
 27736                                  ;	ZF = 1 if no error
 27737                                  ;	   = 0 if error (cluster number > 64k)
 27738                                  ; Uses:
 27739                                  ;       DX,CX
 27740                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27741                                  ; M017	- SHR32 rewritten for better performance
 27742                                  ; M039	- Additional optimization
 27743                                  
 27744                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27745                                  ; DOSCODE:7CBBh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27746                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27747                                  ; DOSCODE:7C81h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27748                                  
 27749                                  SHR32:
 27750                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 27751 00004744 268A4E05                	mov	cl,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 27752 00004748 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch	    ;ZF=1
 27753 0000474A E306                    	jcxz	norota
 27754                                  
 27755                                  rotashft2:
 27756 0000474C D1EA                    	shr	dx,1	    ;ZF reflects state of DX.
 27757 0000474E D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1	    ;ZF not affected.
 27758 00004750 E2FA                    	loop	rotashft2
 27759                                  norota:
 27760 00004752 C3                      	retn
 27761

 27763                                  ; DIR.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 27768                                  ;	TITLE	DIR - Directory and path cracking
 27769                                  ;	NAME	Dir
 27770                                  
 27771                                  ;Break	<FINDENTRY -- LOOK FOR AN ENTRY>
 27772                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27773                                  ;
 27774                                  ; Procedure Name : FINDENTRY,SEARCH
 27775                                  ;
 27776                                  ; Inputs:
 27777                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 27778                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 27779                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Starting directory sector number
 27780                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster of directory
 27781                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 27782                                  ;	[NAME1] = Name to look for
 27783                                  ; Function:
 27784                                  ;	Find file name in disk directory.
 27785                                  ;	"?" matches any character.
 27786                                  ; Outputs:
 27787                                  ;	Carry set if name not found
 27788                                  ;	ELSE
 27789                                  ;	Zero set if attributes match (always except when creating)
 27790                                  ;	AH = Device ID (bit 7 set if not disk)
 27791                                  ;	[THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters
 27792                                  ;	DS = DOSGROUP
 27793                                  ;	ES = DOSGROUP
 27794                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer into directory buffer
 27795                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI = Pointer to First Cluster field in directory entry
 27796                                  ;	[CURBUF] has directory record with match
 27797                                  ;	[NAME1] has file name
 27798                                  ;	[LASTENT] is entry number of the entry
 27799                                  ; All other registers destroyed.
 27800                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27801                                  
 27802                                  ;hkn; called from rename.asm and dir2.asm. DS must be already set up at
 27803                                  ;hkn; this point.
 27804                                  
 27805                                  SEARCH:
 27806                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27807                                  	; DOSCODE:7C90h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27808                                  
 27809                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27810                                  	; DOSCODE:7CCA (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27811                                  
 27812                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27813                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 45B3h
 27814                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 27815                                  
 27816                                  	; burada kaldým ... 11/02/2024
 27817                                  
 27818                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27819                                  
 27820                                  	;entry	FindEntry
 27821                                  FINDENTRY:
 27822 00004753 E87005                  	call	STARTSRCH
 27823 00004756 A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 27824                                  	;and	al,9Eh
 27825 00004759 24DE                    	AND	AL,~attr_ignore		; Ignore useless bits
 27826                                  	;cmp	al,8

 27830                                  NOTVOLSRCH:

 27833                                  	;JMP	SETESRET

 27838                                  SRCH:
 27839 00004767 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 27840 00004768 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 27841

 27843

 27845                                  	;MOV	AH,[BX+dir_entry.dir_name] ; mov ah,[bx+0]
 27846 0000476E 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; End of directory?
 27847 00004770 7437                    	JZ	short FREE
 27848                                  
 27849                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27850 00004772 363A26[7F05]            	CMP	AH,[SS:DELALL]		; Free entry?
 27851 00004777 7430                    	JZ	short FREE
 27852                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],8
 27853 00004779 F6470B08                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_volume_id
 27854                                  					; Volume ID file?
 27855 0000477D 7405                    	JZ	short CHKFNAM 		; NO
 27856                                  
 27857                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27858 0000477F 36FE06[7B05]            	INC	BYTE [SS:VOLID]
 27859                                  CHKFNAM:
 27860                                  ;	Context ES
 27861 00004784 8CD6                    	MOV	SI,SS
 27862 00004786 8EC6                    	MOV	ES,SI
 27863 00004788 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 27864                                  
 27865                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 27866 0000478A BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 27867                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 27868                                  
 27869                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 27870                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SS:NAME1],0E5H	; special char check
 27871                                  	;JNZ	short NO_E5
 27872                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:NAME1],05H
 27873                                  	; 22/09/2023
 27874 0000478D 26803DE5                	cmp	byte [es:di],0E5h
 27875 00004791 7504                    	jnz	short NO_E5
 27876 00004793 26C60505                	mov	byte [es:di],05h
 27877                                  NO_E5:
 27878                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 27879 00004797 E86100                  	CALL	MetaCompare
 27880 0000479A 7429                    	JZ	short FOUND
 27881 0000479C 1F                      	POP	DS
 27882                                  
 27883                                  	;entry	NEXTENT
 27884                                  NEXTENT:
 27885 0000479D C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 27886 000047A1 E86600                  	CALL	NEXTENTRY
 27887 000047A4 73C1                    	JNC	short SRCH
 27888                                  	;JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 27889                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27890                                  SETESRET:
 27891 000047A6 16                      	PUSH	SS
 27892 000047A7 07                      	POP	ES
 27893 000047A8 C3                      	retn
 27894                                  FREE:
 27895 000047A9 1F                      	POP	DS
 27896 000047AA 8B0E[4803]              	MOV	CX,[LASTENT]
 27897 000047AE 3B0E[D805]              	CMP	CX,[ENTFREE]
 27898 000047B2 7304                    	JAE	short TSTALL
 27899 000047B4 890E[D805]              	MOV	[ENTFREE],CX
 27900                                  TSTALL:
 27901 000047B8 3A26[7F05]              	CMP	AH,[DELALL]		; At end of directory?
 27902                                  NEXTENTJ:
 27903 000047BC 74DF                    	je	short NEXTENT 		; No - continue search
 27904 000047BE 890E[DA05]              	MOV	[ENTLAST],CX
 27905 000047C2 F9                      	STC
 27906 000047C3 EBE1                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 27907                                  
 27908                                  FOUND:
 27909                                  ; We have a file with a matching name. We must now consider the attributes:
 27910                                  ; ATTRIB	Action
 27911                                  ; ------	------
 27912                                  ; Volume_ID	Is Volume_ID in test?
 27913                                  ; Otherwise	If no create then Is ATTRIB+extra superset of test?
 27914                                  ;		If create then Is ATTRIB equal to test?
 27915                                  
 27916 000047C5 8A2C                    	MOV	CH,[SI] 		; Attributes of file
 27917 000047C7 1F                      	POP	DS
 27918 000047C8 8A26[6B05]              	MOV	AH,[ATTRIB]		; Attributes of search
 27919                                  	;and	ah,9Eh
 27920 000047CC 80E4DE                  	AND	AH,~attr_ignore
 27921                                  	;lea	si,[si+15]
