 30282                                  ;Break <DEV_OPEN_SFT, DEV_CLOSE_SFT - OPEN or CLOSE A DEVICE>
 30283                                  
 30284                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30285                                  ;**	Dev_Open_SFT - Open the Device for an SFT
 30286                                  ;
 30287                                  ;	Dev_Open_SFT issues an open call to the device associated with
 30288                                  ;	the SFT.
 30289                                  ;
 30290                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:DI) = SFT
 30291                                  ;	EXIT	none
 30292                                  ;	USES	all
 30293                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30294                                  
 30295                                  DEV_OPEN_SFT:
 30296 00005100 06                      	push	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21)
 30297 00005101 E854B3                  	call	save_world
 30298                                  	;mov	al,0Dh	
 30299 00005104 B00D                    	MOV	AL,DEVOPN
 30300 00005106 EB06                    	JMP	SHORT DO_OPCLS
 30301                                  
 30302                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30303                                  ; Procedure Name : DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 30304                                  ;
 30305                                  ; Inputs:
 30306                                  ;	ES:DI Points to SFT
 30307                                  ; Function:
 30308                                  ;	Issue a CLOSE call to the correct device
 30309                                  ; Outputs:
 30310                                  ;	None
 30311                                  ; ALL preserved
 30312                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30313                                  
 30314                                  DEV_CLOSE_SFT:
 30315 00005108 06                      	push	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21)
 30316 00005109 E84CB3                  	call	save_world
 30317                                  	;mov	al,0Eh	
 30318 0000510C B00E                    	MOV	AL,DEVCLS
 30319                                  
 30320                                  	; Main entry for device open and close. AL contains the function 
 30321                                  	; requested. Subtlety: if Sharing is NOT loaded then we do NOT issue 
 30322                                  	; open/close to block devices. This allows networks to function but 
 30323                                  	; does NOT hang up with bogus change-line code.
 30324                                  
 30325                                  	;entry	DO_OPCLS
 30326                                  DO_OPCLS:
 30327                                  	; Is the SFT for the net? If so, no action necessary.
 30328                                  
 30329                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 30330                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 30331                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet
 30332 0000510E 26F6450680              	test	byte [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags+1],(sf_isnet>>8)
 30333 00005113 7567                    	jnz	short OPCLS_DONE	; NOP on net SFTs
 30334 00005115 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; Unit
 30335                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],80h
 30336 00005117 26F6450580              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device
 30337                                  	;les	di,[es:di+7]
 30338 0000511C 26C47D07                	LES	DI,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr] ; Get DPB or device
 30339 00005120 7513                    	JNZ	short GOT_DEV_ADDR
 30340                                  
 30341                                  	; We are about to call device open/close on a block driver. If no 
 30342                                  	; sharing then just short circuit to done.
 30343                                  	
 30344                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 30345                                  					; SS override
 30346 00005122 36803E[0303]01          	CMP	byte [ss:fShare],1	;AN010; /NC or no SHARE
 30347 00005128 7652                    	JBE	short OPCLS_DONE	;AN010; yes
 30348                                  
 30349                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 30350                                  	;mov	ah,[es:di+1]
 30351 0000512A 268A6501                	MOV	AH,[ES:DI+DPB.UNIT]	; (ah) = unit
 30352 0000512E 268A0D                  	mov	cl,[es:di]
 30353                                  	;MOV	CL,[ES:DI+DPB.DRIVE]	; (cl) = drive

 30773 00005314 362B0E[010E]            	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 30774 00005319 361B06[030E]            	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 30775                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30776                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 30777 0000531E 7509                    	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30778 00005320 363B0E[7700]            	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 30779 00005325 7302                    	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30780 00005327 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 30781                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 30782                                  	; 16/12/2022
 30783 00005328 C3                      	retn	; 30/04/2019
 30784                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30785                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 30786

 30788 00005329 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30789                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30790 0000532A C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 30792                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 30793                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30794                                  ;
 30795                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 30796                                  ;
 30797                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30798                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30799                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30800                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30801                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 30802                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30803                                  ;
 30804                                  ; Function:
 30805                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 30806                                  ; Output:
 30807                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 30808                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30809                                  
 30810                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 30811                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30812                                  
 30813 0000532B E8D5FF                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 30814 0000532E 720C                    	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30815 00005330 B80100                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 30816 00005333 D3E0                    	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 30817 00005335 F7D0                    	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30818 00005337 362106[050E]            	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 30819                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30820 0000533C C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 30823                                  ; 22/11/2022
 30824                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)

 30826                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 30827                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30828                                  ;
 30829                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 30830                                  ;
 30831                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 30832                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 30833                                  ; Function:
 30834                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30835                                  ; Output:
 30836                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 30837                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 30838                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 30839                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 30840                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 30841                                  ;     
 30842                                  ;		       0 if failed

 30847

 30849 00005343 744E                    	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30850 00005345 36A1[0E06]              	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr

 30852 0000534D 36A1[0C06]              	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30853 00005351 36A3[6803]              	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 30854 00005355 36C606[070E]00          	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 30855 0000535B 36C706[6C03]0100        	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 30856                                  
 30857                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 30858 00005362 36F606[5E03]80          	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 30859 00005368 7513                    	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30860 0000536A 1E                      	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30861 0000536B 56                      	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30862 0000536C 06                      	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30863 0000536D 57                      	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30864 0000536E 52                      	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30865 0000536F 51                      	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30866 00005370 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30867 00005372 E83100                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30868 00005375 59                      	POP	CX
 30869 00005376 5A                      	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30870 00005377 5F                      	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30871 00005378 07                      	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.

 30875                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;

 30880 00005392 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 30882 00005393 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30883 00005394 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 30890                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30891                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30892                                  ;
 30893                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30894                                  ;
 30895                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30896                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30897                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30898                                  ; Function:
 30899                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30900                                  ; Output:
 30901                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30902                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30903                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30904                                  
 30905                                  SC2BUF:
 30906                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30907 00005395 E86BFF                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache

 30909                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30910 00005398 723D                    	jc	short sexit
 30911 0000539A B80100                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30912 0000539D D3E0                    	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30913 0000539F 368506[050E]            	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30914 000053A4 7430                    	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30915                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30916                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30917                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30918                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30919                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30920 000053A6 36A1[FE0D]              	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30921 000053AA 91                      	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30922 000053AB F7E1                    	mul	cx
 30923 000053AD 360306[7300]            	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30924 000053B2 361316[7500]            	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30925 000053B7 8EDA                    	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30926 000053B9 89C6                    	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30927 000053BB 368E06[6A03]            	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30928 000053C0 368B3E[6803]            	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30929                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30930                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30931 000053C5 D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30932                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30933                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;

 30935 000053CD 7403                    	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30936 000053CF D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30937 000053D1 66                      	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30938                                  nodd:
 30939 000053D2 F3A5                    	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30940 000053D4 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30941 000053D5 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30942                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30943 000053D6 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30944                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30945 000053D7 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB.

 30976                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 30977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30978                                  ;
 30979                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30980                                  ;
 30981                                  ; Inputs:
 30982                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30983                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30984                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30985                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30986                                  ;               entries
 30987                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30988                                  ; Function:
 30989                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30990                                  ; Outputs:
 30991                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30992                                  ;       ELSE
 30993                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30994                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30995                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30996                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 30997                                  ;

 31000                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31001                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)

 31003                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)

 31008                                  BUILDDIR:
 31009                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 31010                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h

 31012 000053D8 A1[D805]                        MOV     AX,[ENTFREE]
 31013 000053DB 83F8FF                          CMP     AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 31014                                  	;JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 31015                                          ;CLC
 31016                                          ;retn
 31017                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31018 000053DE 7507                    	jne	short builddir_cmc_retn  ; cf=1 (will be 0)
 31019                                  
 31020                                  CHECK_IF_ROOT:
 31021 000053E0 833E[C205]00                    CMP     word [DIRSTART],0
 31022 000053E5 7502                            JNZ	short NEWDIR
 31023                                          ;STC
 31024                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31025                                  	; [DIRSTART]=0, cf=0, zf=1 (cf will be 1 after cmc instruction)
 31026                                  builddir_cmc_retn:
 31027                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31028 000053E7 F5                      	cmc	; cf=1 <-> cf=0
 31029                                  builddir_retn:
 31030 000053E8 C3                              retn				; Can't grow root
 31031

 31033                                  NEWDIR:

 31036 000053EF 7405                            JZ	short NULLDIR

 31039                                  NULLDIR:
 31040 000053F6 B90100                          MOV     CX,1
 31041 000053F9 E8B505                  	call	ALLOCATE
 31042 000053FC 72EA                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 31043 000053FE 8B16[C205]                      MOV     DX,[DIRSTART]
 31044 00005402 09D2                            OR      DX,DX
 31045 00005404 750D                            JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 31046 00005406 E818F5                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 31047 00005409 72DD                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 31048 0000540B C706[4803]FFFF                  MOV     word [LASTENT],-1
 31049 00005411 EB29                            JMP     SHORT GOTDIRREC
 31050                                  ADDINGDIR:
 31051 00005413 53                              PUSH    BX
 31052 00005414 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 31053 00005418 E8A90C                          call	IsEOF
 31054 0000541B 5B                              POP     BX
 31055 0000541C 7217                            JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 31056                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 31057 0000541E 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX
 31058                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31059                                  	;PUSH	CX ; (not necessary)
 31060 00005422 50                      	PUSH	AX
 31061 00005423 55                      	PUSH	BP
 31062 00005424 B401                            MOV     AH,1			; CLUSNUM update
 31063                                  	; 15/12/2022
 31064 00005426 268A5600                	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 31065                                          ; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31066                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 31067                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 31068 0000542A 8B0E[C205]                      MOV     CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 31069 0000542E 89DD                            MOV     BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 31070 00005430 E83BD9                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 31071 00005433 5D                              POP     BP
 31072 00005434 58                              POP     AX
 31073                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31074                                          ;POP	CX
 31075                                  
 31076                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 31077                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 31078 00005435 89DA                            MOV     DX,BX
 31079 00005437 30DB                            XOR     BL,BL
 31080 00005439 E84505                  	call	FIGREC
 31081                                  GOTDIRREC:
 31082                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 31083 0000543C 268A4E04                        MOV     CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 31084 00005440 FEC1                            INC     CL
 31085 00005442 30ED                            XOR     CH,CH
 31086                                  ZERODIR:
 31087 00005444 51                              PUSH    CX
 31088                                  	; 22/09/2023
 31089                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 31090                                          ;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; *
 31091 00005445 B0FF                            MOV     AL,0FFH
 31092                                          ;call	GETBUFFR
 31093 00005447 E8CC10                          call	GETBUFFRD ; *
 31094 0000544A 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 31095 0000544C 59                              POP     CX
 31096 0000544D C3                              retn
 31097                                  
 31098                                  GET_SSIZE:
 31099                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 31100 0000544E 268B4E02                        MOV     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 31101 00005452 06                              PUSH    ES
 31102 00005453 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 31103                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 31104 00005457 26804D0504                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 31105 0000545C 57                              PUSH    DI
 31106                                  	;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 31107                                  	;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 31108 0000545D 83C718                          ADD     DI,BUFINSIZ
 31109 00005460 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 31110 00005462 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 31111 00005464 F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 31112 00005466 7301                            JNC	short EVENZ
 31113 00005468 AA                              STOSB
 31114                                  EVENZ:

 31116

 31118 0000546A 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31119                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 31121 00005471 E8B512                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 31122

 31124 00005474 26804D0540              	OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31125                                  yesdirty7:
 31126 00005479 07                              POP	ES
 31127 0000547A 59                              POP	CX
 31128

 31130

 31133

 31138                                  	;; 24/09/2023

 31143 0000547C 7504                    	jnz	short loop_zerodir
 31144 0000547E FF06[0706]              	inc	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 31145                                  loop_zerodir:

 31155                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31156                                  ;
 31157                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31158                                  ;
 31159                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31160                                  ;
 31161                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31162                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31163                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31164                                  ;
 31165                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31166                                  
 31167                                  SETDOTENT:
 31168                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31169 00005489 AB                              STOSW
 31170 0000548A B90400                          MOV     CX,4
 31171 0000548D B82020                          MOV     AX,"  " ; 2020h
 31172 00005490 F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 31173 00005492 AA                              STOSB
 31174                                  
 31175                                  ;	Set up attribute
 31176                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31177 00005493 B010                            MOV     AL,attr_directory
 31178 00005495 AA                              STOSB
 31179                                  
 31180                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 31181 00005496 83C70A                          ADD     DI,10
 31182 00005499 8B36[9E05]                      MOV     SI,[THISSFT]
 31183                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 31184 0000549D 8B440D                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 31185 000054A0 AB                              STOSW
 31186                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 31187 000054A1 8B440F                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 31188 000054A4 AB                      	STOSW
 31189                                  
 31190                                  ;	Set up first cluster field
 31191 000054A5 89D0                            MOV     AX,DX
 31192 000054A7 AB                              STOSW
 31193                                  
 31194                                  ;	0 file size
 31195 000054A8 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 31196 000054AA AB                              STOSW
 31197 000054AB AB                              STOSW
 31198 000054AC C3                              retn

 31200                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31201                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31202                                  ;
 31203                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31204                                  ;
 31205                                  ; Inputs:
 31206                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31207                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31208                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31209                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31210                                  ;
 31211                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31212                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31213                                  ;
 31214                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31215                                  ;               terminated)
 31216                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31217                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31218                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31219                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31220                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31221                                  ; Function:
 31222                                  ;       Make a new node
 31223                                  ; Outputs:
 31224                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31225                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31226                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31227                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31228                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31229                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31230                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31231                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31232                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31233                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31234                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31235                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31236                                  ;       ELSE
 31237                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31238                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31239                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31240                                  ;               containing new node.
 31241                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31242                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31243                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31244                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31245                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31246                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31247                                  ;
 31248                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31249                                  
 31250                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31251                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31252                                  
 31253                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31254                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31255                                  
 31256                                  MakeNode:
 31257                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31258 000054AD C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31259 000054B3 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save AH value
 31260 000054B4 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31261 000054B9 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 31262 000054BC E87AF5                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 31263 000054BF 88CA                            MOV     DL,CL           ; Save CL info
 31264 000054C1 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Device ID to CH
 31265 000054C3 58                              POP     AX              ; Get back AH
 31266 000054C4 732E                            JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31267 000054C6 7505                            JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31268 000054C8 80FA80                          CMP     DL,80h          ; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31269 000054CB 7406                            JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31270                                  make_err_4:
 31271 000054CD B004                            MOV     AL,4            ; case 1 bad path
 31272                                  make_err_ret:
 31273 000054CF 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 31274 000054D1 F9                              STC
 31275                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31276 000054D2 C3                              retn
 31277                                  
 31278                                          ;entry	RENAME_MAKE     ; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 31279                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31280                                  make_type:
 31281                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31282                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31283                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 31284 000054D3 F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 31285 000054D8 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31286 000054DA 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31287                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31288                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31289 000054DF F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31290 000054E4 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31291 000054E6 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31292 000054E7 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31293                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31294                                  make_retn:
 31295                                  	;return
 31296 000054EA C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31297                                  
 31298                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31299                                  
 31300                                  make_type2:
 31301 000054EB C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 31302 000054EF 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX           ; nothing exists Disk Node
 31303 000054F1 F9                              STC                     ; Not found
 31304 000054F2 EB5A                            JMP     short make_new
 31305                                  
 31306                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31307                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31308                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31309                                  ;   else => file
 31310                                  
 31311                                  make_exists:
 31312 000054F4 7448                            JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31313 000054F6 B003                            MOV     AL,3            ; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31314                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31315 000054F8 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31316 000054FD 753B                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31317                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31318                                                                  ;       if making DIR or Volume ID
 31319 000054FF 08ED                            OR      CH,CH
 31320 00005501 781A                            JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31321 00005503 08E4                            OR      AH,AH
 31322 00005505 75C8                            JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31323 00005507 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save device ID
 31324 00005508 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31325                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31326 0000550C 268A6F0B                        MOV     CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31327                                  	;test	ch,1
 31328 00005510 F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 31329 00005513 7524                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 31330 00005515 E8C2F7                  	call	MatchAttributes
 31331 00005518 59                              POP     CX              ; Devid back in CH
 31332 00005519 751F                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 31333 0000551B 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; AL = 0, Disk Node
 31334                                  make_share:
 31335 0000551D 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 31336 0000551F 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save Disk or Device node
 31337 00005520 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save Device ID
 31338 00005521 88EC                            MOV     AH,CH           ; Device ID to AH
 31339 00005523 E84501                          CALL    DOOPEN          ; Fill in SFT for share check
 31340 00005526 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 31341 0000552A 56                      	push	si
 31342 0000552B 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 31343 0000552C E81D2A                  	call	ShareEnter
 31344 0000552F 735A                            jnc	short MakeEndShare
 31345                                  
 31346                                  ; User failed request.
 31347 00005531 5B                      	pop	bx
 31348 00005532 5E                      	pop	si
 31349 00005533 59                      	pop	cx
 31350 00005534 58                      	pop	ax
 31351                                  
 31352                                  Make_Share_ret:
 31353 00005535 B006                            MOV     AL,6
 31354 00005537 EB96                            JMP	short make_err_ret
 31355                                  
 31356                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 31357 00005539 59                              POP     CX              ; Get back device ID
 31358                                  make_err_ret_5:
 31359 0000553A B005                            MOV     AL,5            ; Attribute mismatch
 31360                                          ; 22/11/2022
 31361 0000553C EB91                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 31362                                  
 31363                                  make_exists_dir:
 31364 0000553E B001                            MOV     AL,1            ; exists as directory, always an error
 31365                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31366 00005540 EB8D                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 31367                                  
 31368                                  make_save:
 31369 00005542 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save whether Disk or File
 31370 00005543 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX           ; Device ID to AH
 31371 00005545 E87400                          CALL    NEWENTRY
 31372 00005548 58                              POP     AX              ; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 31373 00005549 739F                            jnc	short make_retn
 31374 0000554B B002                            MOV     AL,2            ; create failed case 2
 31375                                  make_save_retn:
 31376 0000554D C3                              retn
 31377                                  
 31378                                  make_new:
 31379 0000554E E8F1FF                          call    make_save
 31380 00005551 72FA                            jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 31381                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 31382 00005553 F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 31383 00005558 75F3                            jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 31384                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 31385 0000555A 50                      	push	ax
 31386 0000555B 53                      	push	bx
 31387 0000555C 56                      	push	si		
 31388 0000555D E8EC29                          call	ShareEnter
 31389 00005560 5E                      	pop	si
 31390 00005561 5B                      	pop	bx
 31391 00005562 58                      	pop	ax
 31392 00005563 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 31393                                  
 31394                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 31395                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 31396                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 31397                                  
 31398 00005565 50                              PUSH    AX
 31399 00005566 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 31400                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 31401 0000556A 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 31402                                  	
 31403                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31404                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 31405 0000556E 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 31406                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 31407 00005573 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 31408                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31409 00005575 E8B111                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 31410                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 31411 00005578 26804D0540                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 31412                                  yesdirty8:
 31413 0000557D C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 31414                                  	; 15/12/2022
 31415 00005581 268A4600                        mov	al,[ES:BP]
 31416                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31417                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 31418                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 31419 00005585 E89010                          call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 31420 00005588 58                              POP     AX
 31421 00005589 EBAA                            jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 31422                                  
 31423                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 31424                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 31425                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 31426                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 31427                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 31428                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 31429                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 31430                                  ;
 31431                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 31432                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 31433                                  
 31434                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31435                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31436                                  
 31437                                  MakeEndShare:
 31438 0000558B C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 31439 0000558F 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 31440 00005591 E855C3                  	call	ECritSFT
 31441 00005594 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 31442                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 31443 00005597 50                      	push	ax
 31444 00005598 57                      	push	di
 31445 00005599 06                      	push	es
 31446 0000559A 9C                              PUSHF
 31447 0000559B E8A929                          call	ShareEnd                ; remove sharing
 31448 0000559E 9D                              POPF
 31449 0000559F 07                      	pop	es
 31450 000055A0 5F                      	pop	di
 31451 000055A1 268F05                          pop	word [ES:DI]	
 31452                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 31453 000055A4 E86FC3                  	call	LCritSFT
 31454                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31455                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31456 000055A7 5B                      	pop	bx
 31457 000055A8 5E                      	pop	si
 31458 000055A9 59                      	pop	cx
 31459 000055AA 58                      	pop	ax
 31460 000055AB E894FF                          CALL    make_save
 31461                                  
 31462                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 31463                                  
 31464 000055AE 729D                            jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 31465 000055B0 50                      	push	ax
 31466 000055B1 53                      	push	bx
 31467 000055B2 56                      	push	si
 31468 000055B3 9C                              PUSHF
 31469 000055B4 E89529                          call	ShareEnter
 31470 000055B7 9D                              POPF
 31471 000055B8 5E                      	pop	si
 31472 000055B9 5B                      	pop	bx
 31473 000055BA 58                      	pop	ax
 31474                                  
 31475                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 31476                                  
 31477                                  makeendshare_retn:
 31478 000055BB C3                              retn
 31479                                  
 31480                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31481                                  ;
 31482                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 31483                                  ;
 31484                                  ; Inputs:
 31485                                  ;       [THISSFT] set
 31486                                  ;       [THISDPB] set
 31487                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31488                                  ;               entries
 31489                                  ;       [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 31490                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 31491                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31492                                  ;       CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 31493                                  ;               NC means file existed (device)
 31494                                  ;               C  means file did not exist
 31495                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 31496                                  ;       If FILE
 31497                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31498                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31499                                  ;       If device
 31500                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31501                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31502                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31503                                  ; Function:
 31504                                  ;       Make a new directory entry
 31505                                  ;       If an old one existed it is truncated first
 31506                                  ; Outputs:
 31507                                  ;       Carry set if error
 31508                                  ;               Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 31509                                  ;               vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 31510                                  ;       else
 31511                                  ;               outputs of DOOPEN
 31512                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 31513                                  ;
 31514                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31515                                  
 31516                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31517                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31518                                  
 31519                                  NEWENTRY:
 31520 000055BC C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 31521 000055C0 7315                            JNC	short EXISTENT	
 31522 000055C2 803E[4A03]00                    CMP     byte [FAILERR],0
 31523                                  	;STC
 31524                                          ;jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 31525                                          ; 24/09/2023
 31526 000055C7 750C                    	jnz	short ERRRET3
 31527 000055C9 E80CFE                  	CALL    BUILDDIR        ; Try to build dir
 31528 000055CC 72ED                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 31529 000055CE E891F2                          call	GETENT          ; Point at that free entry
 31530 000055D1 72E8                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 31531 000055D3 EB0E                            JMP     SHORT FREESPOT
 31532                                  
 31533                                  ERRRET3:
 31534 000055D5 F9                              STC
 31535                                  newentry_retn:
 31536 000055D6 C3                              retn
 31537                                  
 31538                                  EXISTENT:
 31539 000055D7 08E4                            OR      AH,AH           ; Check if file is I/O device
 31540 000055D9 7903                            JNS	short NOT_DEV1
 31541 000055DB E98D00                          JMP     DOOPEN          ; If so, proceed with open
 31542                                  
 31543                                  NOT_DEV1:
 31544 000055DE E82901                          call	FREEENT		; Free cluster chain
 31545 000055E1 72F3                            jc	short newentry_retn ; Failed
 31546                                  FREESPOT:
 31547                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],8
 31548 000055E3 F606[6B05]08            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id
 31549 000055E8 7407                            JZ	short NOTVOLID
 31550 000055EA 803E[7B05]00                    CMP     BYTE [VOLID],0
 31551 000055EF 75E4                            JNZ	short ERRRET3	; Can't create a second volume ID
 31552                                  NOTVOLID:
 31553 000055F1 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31554 000055F5 89DF                            MOV     DI,BX
 31555                                  
 31556 000055F7 BE[4B05]                        MOV     SI,NAME1
 31557                                  
 31558 000055FA B90500                          MOV     CX,5
 31559 000055FD F3A5                            REP     MOVSW
 31560 000055FF A4                              MOVSB                   ; Move name into dir entry
 31561 00005600 A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 31562 00005603 AA                      	STOSB                   ; Attributes
 31563                                  
 31564                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 31565 00005604 B105                            MOV     CL,5            ;FT. assume normal FBUGBUG	;AN000;
 31566                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 31567                                  
 31568 00005606 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 31569 00005608 F3AB                            REP     STOSW           ; Zero pad
 31570 0000560A E855B5                          call	DATE16
 31571 0000560D 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 31572 0000560E AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_time
 31573 0000560F 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 31574 00005610 AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_date
 31575 00005611 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 31576 00005613 57                              PUSH    DI              ; Correct SI input value
 31577                                  				; 	(recomputed for new buffer)
 31578 00005614 AB                              STOSW                   ; Zero dir_first and size
 31579 00005615 AB                              STOSW
 31580 00005616 AB                              STOSW
 31581                                  updnxt:
 31582 00005617 8B36[E205]              	MOV	SI,[CURBUF]
 31583                                  
 31584                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31585                                  
 31586                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31587 0000561B 26F6440540              	TEST	byte [ES:SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31588                                  				;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 31589 00005620 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty9	;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 31590 00005622 E80411                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 31591                                          
 31592                                  	;or	byte [es:si+5],40h
 31593 00005625 26804C0540              	OR      byte [ES:SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31594                                  yesdirty9:
 31595 0000562A C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 31596                                  	; 15/12/2022
 31597 0000562E 268A4600                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP]
 31598                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31599                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 31600                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE] ; Sets AH value again (in AL)
 31601 00005632 50                              PUSH    AX
 31602 00005633 53                              PUSH    BX
 31603                                  
 31604                                  ; If we have a file, we need to increment the open ref. count so that
 31605                                  ; we have some protection against invalid media changes if an Int 24
 31606                                  ; error occurs.
 31607                                  ; Do nothing for a device.
 31608                                  
 31609 00005634 06                      	push	es
 31610 00005635 57                      	push	di
 31611 00005636 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 31612                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],80h
 31613                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device
 31614 0000563A 26F6450580              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device
 31615 0000563F 751A                            jnz	short GotADevice
 31616 00005641 1E                      	push	ds
 31617 00005642 53                      	push	bx
 31618 00005643 C51E[8A05]                      LDS     BX,[THISDPB]
 31619                                  	;mov	[es:di+7],bx
 31620 00005647 26895D07                        MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr],BX
 31621 0000564B 8CDB                            MOV     BX,DS
 31622                                  	;mov	[es:di+9],bx
 31623 0000564D 26895D09                        MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr+2],BX
 31624 00005651 5B                      	pop	bx
 31625 00005652 1F                      	pop	ds ; need to use DS for segment later on
 31626 00005653 E8AAFA                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT    ; increment ref. count
 31627 00005656 C606[A20A]01                    mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],1; set flag
 31628                                  GotADevice:
 31629 0000565B 5F                      	pop	di
 31630 0000565C 07                      	pop	es
 31631                                  
 31632 0000565D E8B80F                          call	FLUSHBUF
 31633 00005660 E8EF00                          Call    CHECK_VIRT_OPEN ; decrement ref. count            ;AN000;
 31634 00005663 5B                              POP     BX
 31635 00005664 58                              POP     AX
 31636 00005665 5E                              POP     SI              ; Get SI input back
 31637 00005666 88C4                            MOV     AH,AL           ; Get I/O driver number back
 31638 00005668 7301                    	jnc	short DOOPEN    ; Failed
 31639 0000566A C3                      	retn
 31640                                  	
 31641                                  ;NOTE FALL THROUGH
 31642                                  
 31643                                  ; DOSCODE:8AE4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31644                                  
 31645                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31646                                  ; DOSCODE:8AA9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31647                                  
 31648                                  ; DOOPEN
 31649                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31650                                  ;
 31651                                  ; Inputs:
 31652                                  ;       [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31653                                  ;       [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31654                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 31655                                  ;       If FILE
 31656                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31657                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31658                                  ;       If device
 31659                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31660                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31661                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31662                                  ; Function:
 31663                                  ;       Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31664                                  ; Outputs:
 31665                                  ;       CARRY CLEAR
 31666                                  ;       sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31667                                  ;       sf_flags high byte = 0
 31668                                  ;       sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31669                                  ;       sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31670                                  ;       sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31671                                  ;       sf_position = 0
 31672                                  ;       If device
 31673                                  ;           sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 31674                                  ;           sf_size = 0
 31675                                  ;       If file
 31676                                  ;           sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 31677                                  ;           sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 31678                                  ;           sf_cluspos = 0
 31679                                  ;           sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 31680                                  ;           sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 31681                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 31682                                  ;
 31683                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31684                                  
 31685                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 31686                                  DOOPEN:
 31687                                  ;	Generate and store attribute
 31688                                  
 31689 0000566B 88E6                            MOV     DH,AH           ; AH to different place
 31690 0000566D C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 31691                                  	;add	di,4

 31880                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31881                                  ;
 31882                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 31883                                  ;
 31884                                  ; Inputs:
 31885                                  ;       ES:BP -> DPB
 31886                                  ;       [CURBUF] Set
 31887                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 31888                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 31889                                  ; Function:
 31890                                  ;       Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 31891                                  ; Outputs:
 31892                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 31893                                  ;       (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 31894                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 31895                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31896                                  
 31897                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31898                                  FREEENT:
 31899 0000570A 1E                              PUSH    DS
 31900 0000570B C53E[E205]                      LDS     DI,[CURBUF]
 31901 0000570F 8B0C                            MOV     CX,[SI]         ; Get pointer to clusters
 31902                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31903                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31904 00005711 8B5508                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]  ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31905                                  ;hkn; SS override
 31906 00005714 368916[0706]                    MOV	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],DX		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31907 00005719 8B5506                          MOV     DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 31908 0000571C 1F                              POP     DS
 31909 0000571D 83F902                  	CMP	CX,2
 31910 00005720 722E                            JB	short RET1	; Was 0 length file (or mucked Firclus if CX=1)
 31911                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 31912 00005722 263B4E0D                        CMP     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 31913 00005726 7728                            JA	short RET1	; Treat like zero length file (firclus mucked)
 31914 00005728 29FB                            SUB     BX,DI
 31915 0000572A 53                              PUSH    BX              ; Save offset
 31916 0000572B FF36[0706]              	PUSH	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31917 0000572F 52                              PUSH    DX              ; Save sector number
 31918 00005730 89CB                            MOV     BX,CX
 31919 00005732 E82803                          call	RELEASE         ; Free any data allocated
 31920 00005735 5A                              POP     DX
 31921 00005736 8F06[0706]                      POP	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31922 0000573A 7302                            JNC	short GET_BUF_BACK
 31923 0000573C 5B                              POP     BX
 31924                                  freeent_retn:
 31925 0000573D C3                              retn			; Screw up
 31926                                  
 31927                                  GET_BUF_BACK:
 31928                                  	; 22/09/2023
 31929                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 31930                                          ;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL ; *
 31931                                          ;XOR	AL,AL ; *
 31932                                  	;call	GETBUFFR        ; Get sector back
 31933 0000573E E8D30D                  	call	GETBUFFER ; * ; pre read      
 31934                                  
 31935 00005741 5B                      	POP     BX              ; Get offset back
 31936 00005742 72F9                            jc	short freeent_retn
 31937 00005744 E842E8                  	call	SET_BUF_AS_DIR

 31940                                  	;add	si,1Ah

 31942                                  RET1:

 31944 00005751 C3                              retn

 31946                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31947                                  ;
 31948                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 31949                                  ;
 31950                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 31951                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 31952                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 31953                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 31954                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 31955                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 31956                                  ;
 31957                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31958                                  
 31959                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 31960 00005752 50                      	PUSH    AX
 31961 00005753 9F                              lahf                    ; preserve flags
 31962 00005754 803E[A20A]00                    CMP     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 31963 00005759 7410                            JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 31964 0000575B C606[A20A]00                    mov     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0	; reset flag
 31965 00005760 06                      	push	es
 31966 00005761 57                      	push	di
 31967 00005762 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 31968 00005766 E89FF9                          call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 31969 00005769 5F                      	pop	di
 31970 0000576A 07                      	pop	es
 31971                                  
 31972                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 31973 0000576B 9E                              sahf                    ; restore flags
 31974 0000576C 58                              POP     AX
 31975 0000576D C3                              retn

 32009                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32010                                  ;
 32011                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 32012                                  ;
 32013                                  ; Inputs:
 32014                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip
 32015                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32016                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT
 32017                                  ; Outputs:
 32018                                  ;       BX = Last cluster skipped to
 32019                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)
 32020                                  ;       DX = Position of last cluster
 32021                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32022                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 32023                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32214                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 32215                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32216                                  ;
 32217                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 32218                                  ;
 32219                                  ; Inputs:
 32220                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 32221                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 32222                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32223                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 32224                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 32225                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 32226                                  ; Function:
 32227                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 32228                                  ;       read if necessary.
 32229                                  ; Outputs:
 32230                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 32231                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 32232                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 32233                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32234                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 32235                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 32236                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32237                                  
 32238                                  BUFSEC:
 32239 00005822 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 32240 00005826 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 32241                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h

 32249 00005840 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 32250 00005842 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]

 32268                                  ;

 32270                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32271                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32272                                  ;

 32305

 32506                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 32507                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32508                                  ;
 32509                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 32510                                  ;
 32511                                  ; Inputs:
 32512                                  ;       BX = Physical cluster
 32513                                  ;       CX = No. of records
 32514                                  ;       DL = sector within cluster
 32515                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32516                                  ;       [NEXTADD] = transfer address
 32517                                  ; Outputs:
 32518                                  ;       AX = No. of records remaining
 32519                                  ;       BX = Transfer address
 32520                                  ;       CX = No. or records to be transferred
 32521                                  ;       DX = Physical sector address            (LOW)
 32522                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR] = Physical sector address (HIGH)
 32523                                  ;       DI = Next cluster
 32524                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed
 32525                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32526                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32527                                  ; ES:BP unchanged. Note that segment of transfer not set.
 32528                                  ;
 32529                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32530                                  
 32531                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32532                                  OPTIMIZE:
 32533 00005923 52                      	PUSH    DX
 32534 00005924 53                              PUSH    BX
 32535                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 32536 00005925 268A4604                        MOV     AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 32537 00005929 FEC0                            INC     AL              ; Number of sectors per cluster
 32538 0000592B 88C4                            MOV     AH,AL
 32539 0000592D 28D0                            SUB     AL,DL           ; AL = Number of sectors left in first cluster
 32540 0000592F 89CA                            MOV     DX,CX
 32541                                  	;MOV	CX,0
 32542                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32543                                  	; 16/12/2022
 32544 00005931 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx	; sub cx,cx
 32545                                  OPTCLUS:
 32546                                  ; AL has number of sectors available in current cluster
 32547                                  ; AH has number of sectors available in next cluster
 32548                                  ; BX has current physical cluster
 32549                                  ; CX has number of sequential sectors found so far
 32550                                  ; DX has number of sectors left to transfer
 32551                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32552                                  ; ES:SI has FAT pointer
 32553                                  
 32554                                  do_norm3:
 32555 00005933 E8A507                          call	UNPACK
 32556 00005936 7236                            JC	short OP_ERR
 32557                                  clusgot2:
 32558 00005938 00C1                    	ADD	CL,AL
 32559 0000593A 80D500                          ADC     CH,0
 32560 0000593D 39D1                            CMP     CX,DX
 32561 0000593F 7332                            JAE	short BLKDON
 32562 00005941 88E0                            MOV     AL,AH
 32563 00005943 43                              INC     BX
 32564 00005944 39DF                            CMP     DI,BX
 32565 00005946 74EB                            JZ	short OPTCLUS
 32566 00005948 4B                              DEC     BX
 32567                                  FINCLUS:

 32569 0000594D 29CA                            SUB     DX,CX           ; Number of sectors still needed
 32570 0000594F 52                              PUSH    DX
 32571 00005950 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX
 32572                                  	;mul	word[ES:BP+2]

 32574                                  				; Number of sectors times sector size
 32575 00005956 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 32576 0000595A 01F0                            ADD     AX,SI           ; Adjust by size of transfer
 32577 0000595C A3[B805]                        MOV     [NEXTADD],AX
