 44139                                  ;Break	<Extended_Open- Extended open the file>
 44140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44141                                  ; Input: AL= 0 reserved  AH=6CH
 44142                                  ;	 BX= mode
 44143                                  ;	 CL= create attribute  CH=search attribute (from server)
 44144                                  ;	 DX= flag
 44145                                  ;	 DS:SI = file name
 44146                                  ;	 ES:DI = parm list
 44147                                  ;			   DD  SET EA list (-1) null
 44148                                  ;			   DW  n  parameters
 44149                                  ;			   DB  type (TTTTTTLL)
 44150                                  ;			   DW  IOMODE
 44151                                  ; Function: Extended Open
 44152                                  ; Output: carry clear
 44153                                  ;		     AX= handle
 44154                                  ;		     CX=1 file opened
 44155                                  ;			2 file created/opened
 44156                                  ;			3 file replaced/opened

 44158                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 44363                                  ;BREAK <$LockOper - Lock Calls>
 44364                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44365                                  ;
 44366                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 44367                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle	       (DOS 3.3)
 44368                                  ;	    MOV     CX, OffsetHigh
 44369                                  ;	    MOV     DX, OffsetLow
 44370                                  ;	    MOV     SI, LengthHigh
 44371                                  ;	    MOV     DI, LengthLow
 44372                                  ;	    MOV     AH, LockOper
 44373                                  ;	    MOV     AL, Request
 44374                                  ;	    INT     21h
 44375                                  ;
 44376                                  ;   Error returns:
 44377                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 44378                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 44379                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 44380                                  ;
 44381                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 44382                                  ;	    MOV     AX, 5C??	       (DOS 4.00)
 44383                                  ;
 44384                                  ;				    0? lock all
 44385                                  ;				    8? lock write
 44386                                  ;				    ?2 lock multiple
 44387                                  ;				    ?3 unlock multiple
 44388                                  ;				    ?4 lock/read
 44389                                  ;				    ?5 write/unlock
 44390                                  ;				    ?6 add (lseek EOF/lock/write/unlock)
 44391                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle
 44392                                  ;	    MOV     CX, count or size
 44393                                  ;	    LDS     DX, buffer
 44394                                  ;	    INT     21h
 44395                                  ;
 44396                                  ;   Error returns:
 44397                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 44398                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 44399                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 44400                                  ;
 44401                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 44611                                  ; LOCK_CHECK
 44612                                  ;MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 44613                                  
 44614                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44615                                  ; Inputs:
 44616                                  ;	Outputs of SETUP
 44617                                  ;	[USER_ID] Set
 44618                                  ;	[PROC_ID] Set
 44619                                  ; Function:
 44620                                  ;	Check for lock violations on local I/O
 44621                                  ;	Retries are attempted with sleeps in between
 44622                                  ; Outputs:
 44623                                  ;    Carry clear
 44624                                  ;	Operation is OK
 44625                                  ;    Carry set
 44626                                  ;	A lock violation detected
 44627                                  ; Outputs of SETUP preserved
 44628                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44629                                  
 44630                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 44631                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 44632                                  LOCK_CHECK:
 44633 00007ED3 8B1E[1A00]              	MOV	BX,[RetryCount]	; Number retries
 44634                                  LockRetry:
 44635 00007ED7 53                      	push	bx		; save regs
 44636 00007ED8 50                      	push	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 44637                                  
 44638                                  	;MSDOS 3.3
 44639                                  	;Call	far [ss:JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 44640                                  	;MSDOS 6.0
 44641 00007ED9 FF1E[B000]              	Call	far [JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 44642                                  
 44643 00007EDD 58                      	pop	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 44644 00007EDE 5B                      	pop	bx		; restrore regs
 44645 00007EDF 7307                    	jnc	short lc_ret_label ; There are no locks (retnc)
 44646                                  LockN:
 44647 00007EE1 E8FE98                  	call	Idle		; wait a while
 44648 00007EE4 4B                      	DEC	BX		; remember a retry
 44649 00007EE5 75F0                    	JNZ	short LockRetry	; more retries left...
 44650 00007EE7 F9                      	STC
 44651                                  lc_ret_label:
 44652 00007EE8 C3                      	retn

 44654                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 44655                                  ; LOCK_VIOLATION
 44656                                  ;MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 44657                                  
 44658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44659                                  ; Inputs:
 44660                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 44661                                  ;	[READOP] indicates whether error on read or write
 44662                                  ; Function:
 44663                                  ;	Handle Lock violation on compatibility (FCB) mode SFTs
 44664                                  ; Outputs:
 44665                                  ;	Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_lock_violation
 44666                                  ;	Carry clear if user wants a retry
 44667                                  ;
 44668                                  ; DS, ES, DI, CX preserved, others destroyed
 44669                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44670                                  
 44671                                  LOCK_VIOLATION:
 44672 00007EE9 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 44673 00007EEA 06                      	PUSH	ES
 44674 00007EEB 57                      	PUSH	DI
 44675 00007EEC 51                      	PUSH	CX
 44676                                  	;mov	ax,21h
 44677 00007EED B82100                  	MOV	AX,error_lock_violation
 44678                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 44679 00007EF0 C606[4B03]18            	MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 44680 00007EF5 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]

 44683                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+11]

 44685 00007F02 E89CDF                  	call	HARDERR

 44715                                  ;============================================================================
 44716                                  ; SHARE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 44717                                  ;============================================================================
 44718                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 44719                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 44720                                  
 44721                                  ; SHARE_CHECK
 44722                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44723                                  ; Inputs:
 44724                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to filled in local file/device SFT for new
 44725                                  ;               instance of file sf_mode ALWAYS has mode (even on FCB SFTs)
 44726                                  ;       [WFP_START] has full path of name
 44727                                  ;       [USER_ID] Set
 44728                                  ;       [PROC_ID] Set
 44729                                  ; Function:
 44730                                  ;       Check for sharing violations on local file/device access
 44731                                  ; Outputs:
 44732                                  ;    Carry clear
 44733                                  ;       Sharing approved
 44734                                  ;    Carry set
 44735                                  ;       A sharing violation detected
 44736                                  ;           AX is error code
 44737                                  ; USES    ALL but DS
 44738                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44739                                  
 44740                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 44741                                  SHARE_CHECK:
 44742                                  	; 26/07/2019
 44743 00007F1C FF1E[9400]              	call	far [JShare+(1*4)] 	; 1 = MFT_Enter
 44744                                  shchk_retn:
 44745 00007F20 C3                      	retn
 44746                                  
 44747                                  ; SHARE_VIOLATION
 44748                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44749                                  ; Inputs:
 44750                                  ;       [THISDPB] Set
 44751                                  ;       AX has error code
 44752                                  ; Function:
 44753                                  ;       Handle Sharing errors
 44754                                  ; Outputs:
 44755                                  ;       Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_sharing_violation
 44756                                  ;       Carry clear if user wants a retry
 44757                                  ;
 44758                                  ; DS, ES, DI preserved, others destroyed
 44759                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44760                                  
 44761                                  SHARE_VIOLATION:
 44762 00007F21 1E                      	PUSH    DS
 44763 00007F22 06                      	PUSH	ES
 44764 00007F23 57                      	PUSH    DI
 44765 00007F24 C606[7505]00            	MOV     byte [READOP],0		; All share errors are reading
 44766                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 44767 00007F29 C606[4B03]18            	MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 44768 00007F2E C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 44769 00007F32 BF0100                  	MOV     DI,1			; Fake some registers
 44770 00007F35 89F9                    	MOV     CX,DI
 44771                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+17]
 44772 00007F37 268B5611                	MOV     DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 44773 00007F3B E863DF                  	call	HARDERR
 44774 00007F3E 5F                      	POP     DI
 44775 00007F3F 07                      	POP	ES
 44776 00007F40 1F                      	POP     DS
 44777 00007F41 3C01                    	CMP     AL,1
 44778 00007F43 74DB                    	jz	short shchk_retn	; 1 = retry, carry clear
 44779 00007F45 F9                      	STC
 44780 00007F46 C3                      	retn
 44781                                  
 44782                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44783                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 44784                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 44785                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 44786                                  ;
 44787                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 44788                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 44789                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 44790                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44791                                  
 44792                                  ShareEnd:
 44793                                  	; 26/07/2019
 44794 00007F47 FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 44795 00007F4B C3                      	retn
 44796                                  
 44797                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 44798                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44799                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 44800                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 44801                                  ;
 44802                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 44803                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 44804                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 44805                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 44806                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 44807                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44808                                  
 44809                                  ShareEnter:
 44810 00007F4C 51                      	push	cx
 44811                                  retry:
 44812 00007F4D 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 44813                                  attempt:
 44814 00007F51 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 44815 00007F55 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 44816                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],axfff
 44817 00007F57 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 44818 00007F5B 51                      	push	cx
 44819 00007F5C E8BDFF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 44820 00007F5F 59                      	pop	cx
 44821 00007F60 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 44822 00007F62 E87D98                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 44823 00007F65 E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 44824 00007F67 E8B7FF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 44825 00007F6A 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 44826                                  done:
 44827 00007F6C 59                      	pop	cx
 44828 00007F6D C3                      	retn
 44829

 44831                                  ; EXEPATCH.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 44832                                  ;============================================================================
 44833                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0
 44834                                  
 44835                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 44836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44837                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 44838                                  ;
 44839                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 44840                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 44841                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 44842                                  ;
 44843                                  ;	Revision history:
 44844                                  ;
 44845                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 44846                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44847                                  
 44848                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44849                                  ;
 44850                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 44851                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 44852                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 44853                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 44854                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 44855                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 44856                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 44857                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 44858                                  ;
 44859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44860                                  
 44861                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 44862                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 44863                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 44864                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 44865                                  
 44866                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 44867                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 44868                                  
 44869                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 44870                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 44871                                  
 44872                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 44873                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 44874                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 44875                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 44876                                  
 44877                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 44878                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 44879                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 44880                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2

 44883                                  ;

 44885                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 44886                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 44887                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 44888                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 44889                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 44890                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 44891                                  ; .size:
 44892                                  ;endstruc

 44901

 44913 00007F6E 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 44914                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1

 44917                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 44918 00007F74 7413                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 44919                                  
 44920                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 44921 00007F76 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 44922 00007F79 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 44923 00007F7C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 44924                                  
 44925                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 44926 00007F7E 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 44927                                  	;mov	cx,[si+12]
 44928 00007F81 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 44929                                  
 44930                                  	;call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 44931 00007F84 36FF16[880D]            	call	word [ss:FixExePatch] ; 28/12/2022
 44932                                  	
 44933                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 44934                                  	;call	[ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 44935                                  
 44936                                  er_setver:
 44937                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 44938                                  	; 17/12/2022
 44939 00007F89 F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 44940                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 44941 00007F8D 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 44942                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 44943 00007F8F 1E                      	push	ds
 44944 00007F90 56                      	push	si
 44945                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 44946 00007F91 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 44947 00007F94 E876ED                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 44948 00007F97 E887ED                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 44949 00007F9A 5E                      	pop	si
 44950 00007F9B 1F                      	pop	ds
 44951                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 44952 00007F9C 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 44953 00007F9F 36A1[020F]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 44954 00007FA3 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 44955                                  
 44956                                  er_chkdoshi:
 44957 00007FA7 36803E[870D]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 44958 00007FAD 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 44959                                  
 44960                                  					; M068 - Start
 44961                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 44962 00007FAF 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 44963                                  
 44964                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 44965 00007FB2 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 44966                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 44967                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 44968                                  					; explanation
 44969                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 44970                                  	; 17/12/2022
 44971 00007FB8 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 44972                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 44973 00007FBC 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 44974                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 44975 00007FBE 1E                         	push	ds
 44976 00007FBF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 44977 00007FC1 E88E02                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 44978 00007FC4 1F                      	pop	ds
 44979                                  
 44980                                  er_setA20:
 44981                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 44982                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 44983                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 44984                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 44985                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 44986                                  
 44987 00007FC5 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 44988 00007FCA 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 44989                                  					; turned OFF.
 44990                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 44991 00007FCE 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 44992 00007FD0 C3                      	retn

 45000                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45001                                  ;
 45002                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 45003                                  ;
 45004                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 45005                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 45006                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 45007                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 45008                                  ;
 45009                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 45010                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 45011                                  ;
 45012                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 45013                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 45014                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 45015                                  ;
 45016                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 45017                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 45018                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 45019                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 45020                                  ; or not.
 45021                                  ;
 45022                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 45023                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 45024                                  ; running in the HMA.
 45025                                  ;
 45026                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 45027                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 45028                                  ;
 45029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45030                                  
 45031                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 45032                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 45033                                  
 45034                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45035                                  ;
 45036                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 45037                                  ;
 45038                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45039                                  
 45040                                  rpFind1:
 45041                                  	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 45042                                  
 45043                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 45044                                  
 45045                                  ;	cli
 45046                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 45047                                  ;	pusha
 45048                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 45049                                  ;	out	43h, al
 45050                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 45051                                  
 45052                                  rpFind1a:
 45053                                  	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 45054                                  
 45055                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 45056                                  
 45057                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 45058                                  ;	out	37h, al
 45059                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 45060                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 45061                                  
 45062                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 45063                                  
 45064                                  rpFind2:
 45065                                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 45066                                  
 45067                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 45068                                  
 45069                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 45070                                  
 45071                                  rpFind3:
 45072                                  	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 45073                                  
 45074                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 45075                                  
 45076                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 45077                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 45078                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 45079                                  
 45080                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 45081                                  
 45082                                  rpRepl2:
 45083                                   	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 45084                                  
 45085                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 45086                                  
 45087                                  ;	push	eax
 45088                                  ;	push	cx
 45089                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 45090                                  
 45091                                  rpRepl3:
 45092                                  	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 45093                                  
 45094                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 45095                                  
 45096                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 45097                                  ;	pop	cx
 45098                                  ;	pop	eax
 45099                                  
 45100                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 45101                                  
 45102                                  rpFind4:
 45103                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 45104                                  
 45105                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 45106                                  
 45107                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 45108                                  ;	pop	ax
 45109                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 45110                                  
 45111                                  rpFind5:
 45112                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 45113                                  
 45114                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 45115                                  
 45116                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 45117                                  ;	int	67h
 45118                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 45119                                  ;	jmp	bx
 45120                                  
 45121                                  rpRepl4:
 45122                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 45123                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 45124                                  
 45125                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 45126                                  
 45127                                  	db	00h, 00h
 45128                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 45129                                  
 45130                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 45131                                  
 45132                                  	db	00h, 00h
 45133                                  
 45134                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 45135                                  
 45136                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 45137                                  ;	pop	ax
 45138                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 45139                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 45140                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 45141                                  
 45142                                  rpRepl5:
 45143                                  	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 45144                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 45145                                  
 45146                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 45147                                  
 45148                                  	db	00h, 00h
 45149                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 45150                                  
 45151                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 45152                                  
 45153                                  	db	00h, 00h
 45154                                  	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 45155                                  
 45156                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 45157                                  
 45158                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 45159                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 45160                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 45161                                  ;	jmp	bx
 45162                                  
 45163                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 45164                                  
 45165                                  rpFind6:

 45167

 45178

 45181

 45190

 45193                                  
 45194                                  rpRepl6Len equ	$ - rpRepl6
 45195                                  
 45196                                  ;	cli
 45197                                  ;	push	eax
 45198                                  ;	push	ebx
 45199                                  ;	push	ecx
 45200                                  ;	push	edx
 45201                                  
 45202                                  rpRepl7:
 45203                                  	db	66h, 5Ah, 66h, 59h, 66h, 5Bh, 66h, 58h, 5Bh
 45204                                  
 45205                                  rpRepl7Len equ	$ - rpRepl7
 45206                                  
 45207                                  ;	pop	edx
 45208                                  ;	pop	ecx
 45209                                  ;	pop	ebx
 45210                                  ;	pop	eax
 45211                                  ;	pop	bx
 45212                                  
 45213                                  ; bug # 4 -- loss of high EAX and EBX on 386+ only if VCPI
 45214                                  
 45215                                  rpFind8:
 45216                                   	db	60h, 06h, 1Eh, 0B8h, 00h, 00h, 8Eh, 0D8h
 45217                                  
 45218                                  rpFind8Len equ	$ - rpFind8
 45219                                  
 45220                                  ;	pusha
 45221                                  ;	push	es
 45222                                  ;	push	ds
 45223                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 45224                                  ;	mov	ds, ax
 45225                                  
 45226                                  rpFind9 :
 45227                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 61h
 45228                                  
 45229                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 45230                                  
 45231                                  ;	pop	ds
 45232                                  ;	pop	es
 45233                                  ;	popa
 45234                                  
 45235                                  rpRepl8:
 45236                                   	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 45237                                  
 45238                                  rpRepl8Len equ	$ - rpRepl8
 45239                                  
 45240                                  ;	pushad
 45241                                  ;	push	es
 45242                                  ;	push	ds
 45243                                  
 45244                                  rpRepl9:
 45245                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 66h, 61h, 0C3h
 45246                                  
 45247                                  rpRepl9Len equ	$ - rpRepl9
 45248                                  
 45249                                  ;	pop	ds
 45250                                  ;	pop	es
 45251                                  ;	popad
 45252                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 45253                                  
 45254                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45255                                  
 45256                                  struc SearchPair
 45257                                   .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 45258                                   .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 45259                                   .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 45260                                   .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 45261                                   .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 45262                                   .size:
 45263                                  endstruc
 45264                                  
 45265                                  ;rpBug1Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind2, rpFind2Len, offset rpFind3, rpFind3Len, 20h>
 45266                                  
 45267                                  rpBug1Strs:
 45268                                  	dw	rpFind2
 45269                                  	dw	rpFind2Len ; 3
 45270                                  	dw	rpFind3
 45271                                  	dw	rpFind3Len ; 4
 45272                                  	dw	20h
 45273                                  
 45274                                  ;rpBug2Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind4, rpFind4Len, offset rpFind5, rpFind5Len, 80h>
 45275                                  
 45276                                  rpBug2Strs:
 45277                                  	dw	rpFind4
 45278                                  	dw	rpFind4Len ; 4
 45279                                  	dw	rpFind5
 45280                                  	dw	rpFind5Len ; 9
 45281                                  	dw	80h
 45282                                  
 45283                                  ;rpBug3Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind6, rpFind6Len, offset rpFind7a, rpFind7aLen, 80h>
 45284                                  
 45285                                  rpBug3Strs:
 45286                                  	dw	rpFind6
 45287                                  	dw	rpFind6Len ; 3
 45288                                  	dw	rpFind7a
 45289                                  	dw	rpFind7aLen ; 7
 45290                                  	dw	80h
 45291                                  
 45292                                  ;rpBug4Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind8, 4, offset rpFind9, rpFind9Len, 80h>
 45293                                  
 45294                                  rpBug4Strs:
 45295                                  	dw	rpFind8
 45296                                  	dw	4
 45297                                  	dw	rpFind9
 45298                                  	dw	rpFind9Len ; 3
 45299                                  	dw	80h
 45300                                  
 45301                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45302                                  
 45303                                  struc StackVars
 45304                                   .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 45305                                   .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 45306                                   .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 45307                                   .size:
 45308                                  endstruc
 45309                                  
 45310                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45311                                  
 45312                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 45313                                  
 45314                                  Rational386Patch:
 45315                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 45316                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 45317                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 45318                                  
 45319                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 45320                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 45321                                  
 45322                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 45323                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 45324                                  
 45325                                  	push	ax
 45326                                  
 45327                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 45328                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 45329                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 45330                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 45331                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 45332                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 45333                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 45334                                  rp3QO_ax:
 45335                                  	pop	ax
 45336                                  rp3QuickOut:
 45337                                  	retn
 45338                                  
 45339                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 45340                                  
 45341                                  rp3Maybe:
 45342                                  	cld
 45343                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 45344                                  	push	cx
 45345                                  	push	dx
 45346                                  	push	si
 45347                                  	push	di
 45348                                  	push	es
 45349                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 45350                                  	push	bp
 45351                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 45352                                  	mov	bp,sp
 45353                                  
 45354                                  	push	cs
 45355                                  	pop	ds
 45356                                  
 45357                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 45358                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 45359                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 45360                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 45361                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 45362                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 45363                                  
 45364                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 45365                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 45366                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 45367                                  ; an 80286 system.
 45368                                  
 45369                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 45370                                  
 45371                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 45372                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 45373                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 45374                                  
 45375                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 45376                                  
 45377                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 45378                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 45379                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 45380                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 45381                                  
 45382                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 45383                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 45384                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 45385                                  
 45386                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 45387                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 45388                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 45389                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 45390                                  
 45391                                  rp3Exit_j:
 45392                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 45393                                  
 45394                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 45395                                  
 45396                                  rpGotPatch:
 45397                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 45398                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 45399                                  
 45400                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45401                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 45402                                  
 45403                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],381
 45404                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],381 ; only need bug 1 if version
 45405                                  	cmp	word [bp],381
 45406                                  	jae	short rpBug2			;   < 3.81
 45407                                  
 45408                                  	mov	bx,rpBug1Strs			; locate find2 & find3 code
 45409                                  	call	FindBadCode
 45410                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 45411                                  
 45412                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset
 45413                                  
 45414                                  	push	di
 45415                                  	mov	di,si				; rpFind2 offset
 45416                                  	mov	dx,rpFind2Len ; 3
 45417                                  
 45418                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],51h	 	; find2 preceeded by push cx?
 45419                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx
 45420                                  
 45421                                  	dec	di				;   yes, gobble up push cx too
 45422                                  	inc	dx
 45423                                  rp_no_cx:
 45424                                  	mov	si,rpRepl2			; patch out find2 sequence
 45425                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl2Len  ; 6
 45426                                  	call	GenPatch
 45427                                  
 45428                                  	pop	di				; rpFind3 offset
 45429                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],59h 		; find3 preceeded by pop cx?
 45430                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx2
 45431                                  
 45432                                  	mov	byte [es:di-1],90h		;   yes, no-op it
 45433                                  rp_no_cx2:
 45434                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 45435                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; change offset of far jmp
 45436                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax
 45437                                  	mov	[es:di+rpFind3Len],ax		;   to go to patch code
 45438                                  
 45439                                  	push	di				; save find3 offset
 45440                                  	mov	si,rpRepl3			; copy repl3 to patch area
 45441                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl3Len ; 5
 45442                                  	call	CopyPatch
 45443                                  
 45444                                  	pop	bx				; find3 offset
 45445                                  	add	bx,rpFind3Len+4	 ; 8		; skip over find3 and far jmp
 45446                                  	call	GenJump 			; jmp back from patch area
 45447                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 45448                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 45449                                  						;   area pointer
 45450                                  
 45451                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45452                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 45453                                  
 45454                                  rpBug2:
 45455                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 45456                                  	call	FindBadCode
 45457                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 45458                                  
 45459                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 45460                                  
 45461                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 45462                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 45463                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 45464                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 45465                                  
 45466                                  	mov	di,si
 45467                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 45468                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 45469                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 45470                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 45471                                  
 45472                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 45473                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 45474                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 45475                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 45476                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 45477                                  	call	GenJump
 45478                                  
 45479                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 45480                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 45481                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 45482                                  						;   main-line code
 45483                                  
 45484                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 45485                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 45486                                  
 45487                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 45488                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 45489                                  
 45490                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 45491                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 45492                                  
 45493                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 45494                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 45495                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 45496                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 45497                                  	add	ax,4
 45498                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 45499                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 45500                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 45501                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 45502                                  
 45503                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 45504                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 45505                                  						; patch area
 45506                                  
 45507                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45508                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 45509                                  
 45510                                  rpBug3:
 45511                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 45512                                  	call	FindBadCode
 45513                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 45514                                  
 45515                                  	;add	di,9
 45516                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 45517                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 45518                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 45519                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 45520                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 45521                                  	pop	si
 45522                                  	jnz	short rpBug4
 45523                                  
 45524                                  	push	di				; save find7b code offset
 45525                                  
 45526                                  	mov	di,si
 45527                                  	mov	dx,rpFind6Len ; 3
 45528                                  	mov	si,rpRepl6
 45529                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl6Len ; 9
 45530                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find6 code
 45531                                  
 45532                                  	pop	di
 45533                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 45534                                  	mov	si,rpRepl7
 45535                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl7Len ; 9
 45536                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find7b code
 45537                                  
 45538                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45539                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 45540                                  
 45541                                  rpBug4:
 45542                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 45543                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if 
 45544                                  	cmp	word [bp],360
 45545                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 45546                                  
 45547                                  	mov	bx,rpBug4Strs			; locate find8 & find9 code
 45548                                  	call	FindBadCode
 45549                                  	jc	short rp3Exit
 45550                                  
 45551                                  	push	di				; save find9 code offset
 45552                                  
 45553                                  	mov	di,si
 45554                                  	mov	dx,3
 45555                                  	mov	si,rpRepl8
 45556                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl8Len ; 4
 45557                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find8 code
 45558                                  
 45559                                  	pop	di				; find9 offset
 45560                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 45561                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; patch find9 to jmp to
 45562                                  	call	GenJump 			;   patch area
 45563                                  
 45564                                  	mov	si,rpRepl9			; copy replacement code to
 45565                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl9Len ; 5		;   patch area--it does a RET
 45566                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no jmp back to main-line
 45567                                  
 45568                                  rp3Exit:
 45569                                  	add	sp,StackVars.size
 45570                                  	pop	bp
 45571                                  	pop	ds
 45572                                  	pop	es
 45573                                  	pop	di
 45574                                  	pop	si
 45575                                  	pop	dx
 45576                                  	pop	cx
 45577                                  	pop	bx
 45578                                  	pop	ax
 45579                                  	retn
 45580                                  
 45581                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45582                                  ;
 45583                                  ; FindBadCode
 45584                                  ;
 45585                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 45586                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 45587                                  ;
 45588                                  ; Entry:
 45589                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 45590                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 45591                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 45592                                  ;
 45593                                  ; Exit:
 45594                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 45595                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 45596                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 45597                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 45598                                  ;
 45599                                  ; Used:
 45600                                  ;	CX
 45601                                  ;
 45602                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45603                                  
 45604                                  ;struc SearchPair
 45605                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 45606                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 45607                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 45608                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 45609                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 45610                                  ; .size:
 45611                                  ;endstruc
 45612                                  
 45613                                  FindBadCode:
 45614                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 45615                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 45616                                  
 45617                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 45618                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 45619                                  	
 45620                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 45621                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 45622                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 45623                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 45624                                  
 45625                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 45626                                  
 45627                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 45628                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 45629                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 45630                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 45631                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 45632                                  
 45633                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 45634                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 45635                                  
 45636                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 45637                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 45638                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 45639                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 45640                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 45641                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 45642                                  
 45643                                  	clc
 45644                                  	retn
 45645                                  
 45646                                  fbc_error:
 45647                                  	stc
 45648                                  	retn
 45649                                  
 45650                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45651                                  ;
 45652                                  ; GenPatch
 45653                                  ;
 45654                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 45655                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 45656                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 45657                                  ; code.
 45658                                  ;
 45659                                  ; Entry:
 45660                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 45661                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 45662                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 45663                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 45664                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 45665                                  ;
 45666                                  ; Exit:
 45667                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 45668                                  ;
 45669                                  ; Used:
 45670                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 45671                                  ;
 45672                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45673                                  
 45674                                  GenPatch:
 45675                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 45676                                  
 45677                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 45678                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 45679                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 45680                                  	call	GenJump
 45681                                  
 45682                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 45683                                  
 45684                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 45685                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 45686                                  
 45687                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 45688                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 45689                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 45690                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 45691                                  	retn
 45692                                  
 45693                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45694                                  ;
 45695                                  ; CopyPatch
 45696                                  ;
 45697                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 45698                                  ;
 45699                                  ; Entry:
 45700                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 45701                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 45702                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 45703                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 45704                                  ;
 45705                                  ; Exit:
 45706                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 45707                                  ;
 45708                                  ; Used:
 45709                                  ;	SI, Flags
 45710                                  ;
 45711                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45712                                  
 45713                                  CopyPatch:
 45714                                  	push	cx
 45715                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 45716                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 45717                                  	cld
 45718                                  	rep movsb
 45719                                  	pop	cx
 45720                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 45721                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 45722                                  	retn
 45723                                  
 45724                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45725                                  ;
 45726                                  ; GenJump
 45727                                  ;
 45728                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 45729                                  ;
 45730                                  ; Entry:
 45731                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 45732                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 45733                                  ;
 45734                                  ; Exit:
 45735                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 45736                                  ;
 45737                                  ; Used:
 45738                                  ;	AX
 45739                                  ;
 45740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45741                                  
 45742                                  GenJump:
 45743                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 45744                                  	stosb
 45745                                  
 45746                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 45747                                  	sub	ax,di
 45748                                  	sub	ax,2
 45749                                  
 45750                                  	stosw			; output offset
 45751                                  
 45752                                  	retn
 45753                                  
 45754                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45755                                  ;
 45756                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 45757                                  ;
 45758                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 45759                                  ;
 45760                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 45761                                  ;
 45762                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45763                                  
 45764                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 45765                                  	mov	di,200h
 45766                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 45767                                  	push	cx
 45768                                  	sub	cx,dx
 45769                                  	inc	cx
 45770                                  scsagain:
 45771                                  	push	si
 45772                                  	push	di
 45773                                  	push	cx
 45774                                  	mov	cx,dx
 45775                                  	rep	cmpsb
 45776                                  	pop	cx
 45777                                  	pop	di
 45778                                  	pop	si
 45779                                  	je	short scsfound
 45780                                  	inc	di
 45781                                  	loop	scsagain
 45782                                  scsfound:
 45783                                  	pop	cx
 45784                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 45785                                  	retn
 45786                                  	
 45787                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45788                                  ;
 45789                                  ; VerifyVersion
 45790                                  ;
 45791                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 45792                                  ; from ES:2A.
 45793                                  ;
 45794                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 45795                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 45796                                  ;
 45797                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45798                                  
 45799                                  VerifyVersion:
 45800                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 45801                                  					;  in ascii
 45802                                  	mov	bl,10
 45803                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 45804                                  
 45805                                  	call	VVDigit
 45806                                  	jne	short vvexit
 45807                                  	call	VVDigit
 45808                                  	jne	short vvexit
 45809                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 45810                                  	jne	short vvexit
 45811                                  	dec	si
 45812                                  	;call	VVDigit
 45813                                  	; 18/12/2022
 45814                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 45815                                  ;vvexit:
 45816                                  	;retn
 45817                                  VVDigit:
 45818                                  	div	bl
 45819                                  	add	ah,'0'
 45820                                  	dec	si
 45821                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 45822                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 45823                                  	retn
 45824                                  
 45825                                  %endif
 45826                                  
 45827                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 46086                                  	;call	ExePackPatch
